name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ochanomizu Jimbocho
description: Opening in February 2015, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ochanomizu Jimbocho is located a 4-minute walk from Jimbocho Subway Station A7 Exit. JR Ochanomizu Station is an 8-minute walk away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Guests can also use coin launderette on site. Simply decorated, each compact room is fitted with a Serta mattresses, a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle. An air purifier/humidifier is provided in all rooms. Free bath amenities including shampoo, conditioner and bath salts are also featured. Skin care amenities including a cleansing oil and face lotions are offered. Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ochanomizu Jimbocho features a 24-hour front desk and free luggage storage services. Drinks vending machines can be used. A set menu including fresh bread and drink is available for breakfast at the bakery on the ground floor. Popular areas like Akihabara and Ueno can be reached within a 5-minute train or subway ride. Tokyo Station is 12 minutes by train, while Shinjuku Station is a 20-minute train ride away. Japan Imperial Palace is 20 minutes on foot from the property, while Tokyo Skytree is a 28-minute train ride away.

name: all day place shibuya
description: Conveniently situated in Tokyo, all day place shibuya provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The hotel features family rooms. All units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Guest rooms in all day place shibuya are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near all day place shibuya include Ancient Egyptian Art Museum, Shidax Culture Hall and Hachiko Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Tokyu Stay Shimbashi
description: Renovated in 2014, Tokyu Stay Shimbashi - Ginza area offers modern accommodations with free WiFi, a microwave and a refrigerator. The hotel is just a 3-minute walk from JR Shimbashi Train Station and Shimbashi Subway Station. Air conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, high speed LAN internet/WiFi and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and a bath. Each room is equipped with a washer and dryer, as well as a safety deposit box. Shimbashi Tokyu Stay has vending machines, an ironing service and a dry cleaning service. It also offers a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage service. A buffet-style breakfast is available at the restaurant. The popular upscale shopping area of Ginza is within a 10-minute walk away, while Tokyo Station is a quick 9-minute walk and train ride away. The Tsukiji Market is a 5-minute taxi ride from the hotel.

name: Richmond Hotel Tokyo Shiba
description: Situated a 6-minute walk from JR Hamamatsucho Station and a 10-minute walk from Tokyo Tower, Richmond Hotel Tokyo Shiba is sophisticated boutique accommodation with property-wide free Wi-Fi. Laptops can be rented, and free-use internet PCs are available in the lobby. Zojo-ji Temple is a 5-minute walk away, and lively Roppongi area is a 10-minute drive or taxi ride from the property. The Hamamatsucho Station provides direct monorail access to Haneda Airport, a 20-minute ride away. Featuring calming earth colours and a relaxing ambience, each modern room at Richmond Hotel Tokyo Shiba is fitted with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom comes with a bath tub and free toiletries. Female guests can receive special amenities at the front desk. The property offers coin launderette and drink vending machines. Luggage can be stored at the 24-hour front desk for free. For guests with breakfast-included reservation, breakfast vouchers (person/night) are available to be used at a coffee shop on the ground floor.

name: Mimaru Tokyo Asakusa Station
description: No description found

name: Apa Hotel Ginza-Kyobashi
description: APA Hotel Ginza Kyobashi offers both non-smoking and smoking rooms with free WiFi and a 40-inch wall-mounted flat-screen TV. It is located within a 5-minute walk from Kyobashi, Takaracho and Ginza-Itchome Yurakucho Subway Stations. The Ginza Kyobashi APA Hotel is approximately a 10-minute walk from the Kabuki-za Theatre, the Imperial Palace and Tokyo International Forum. Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a desk, a fridge and an electric kettle. Guests can relax on the original mattress optimising weight distribution. Japanese pub restaurant Katete offers a wide assortment of drinks and meals, while the hotel’s buffet restaurant caters a variety of Japanese dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It’s open for dinner time until midnight. APA Hotel Ginza Kyobashi has a 24-hour reception, which offers luggage storage and fax/photocopy services. In-room massages can be arranged, and drinks vending machines are on-site.

name: Hotel Mystays Nishi Shinjuku
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, HOTEL MYSTAYS Nishi Shinjuku is located in Tokyo, 600 metres from Studio Alta and 600 metres from Yaso Saijo Monument. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi. The property is 300 metres from Joenji Temple, and within 4.1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At HOTEL MYSTAYS Nishi Shinjuku each room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Seiji Togo Memorial Sompo Japan Nipponkoa Museum of Art, Shinjuku SanPark Shopping Mall and Choko-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from HOTEL MYSTAYS Nishi Shinjuku.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4
description: Attractively situated in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 is situated 100 metres from Horidome Children's Park, 500 metres from Koamicho Children's Park and 200 metres from Suginomori Shrine. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is close to popular attractions like Genyadana Monument, Daiichi Sankyo Kusuri Museum and Fukutoku Shrine. At the hotel, rooms include a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 include Sankatsu Yukata Museum, Takarada Ebisu Shrine and Ozu History Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Hotel Roppongi Ekimae
description: Conveniently located a 1-minute walk from Roppongi Subway Station on the Hibiya and Oedo lines, APA Hotel Roppongi Ekimae offers simply furnished yet functional rooms with free WiFi. Featuring an original mattress optimising weight distribution, compact rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries, a hairdryer and slippers. Guests can make use of the free luggage storage service provided at the 24-hour front desk. Fax, photocopying are offered at an additional charge. 3 different kinds of Western-style breakfast is served from 07:00 until 10:00 while last order is at 09:30. Haneda Airport is a 40-minute train ride while Narita Airport is an 80-minute train ride away.

name: Apa Hotel Iidabashi-Ekimae
description: Located less than a minute's walk away from A5 exit of Iidabashi Station for Tozai Line, APA Hotel Iidabashi Ekimae is a convenient location to explore central Tokyo. Free luggage storage is offered on site and guests can enjoy the complimentary newspaper service during their stay. There is a 24-hour front desk at this property. All guest rooms are carpeted and equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, toilet, a hairdryer and slippers. Rooms come with an original mattress optimising weight distribution. BBC world news is provided for free. Fax and copying services are available for an additional fee. Lifts are secured so only staying guests may access guest room floors. There is a restaurant on site and drinks vending machines at this property. There are restaurants, cafes and a convenience store within a minute's walking distance from the property. Tokyo Dome is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Nippon Budokan is a 15-minute walk away. Tokyo Station is a 12-minute train ride from APA Hotel Iidabashi Ekimae on JR Chuo Line. The Imperial Palace is 20-minutes away via Tozai Line. Guests can reach Shinjuku Station via train in 15 minutes. The nearest airport, Haneda Airport, is approximately 50 minutes away via train or 30 minutes away by car.

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo Itabashi Ekimae
description: APA Hotel Tokyo Itabashi is conveniently located just a minute’s walk from JR Itabashi Station and features well-equipped room with flat-screen TVs, a restaurant and coin-operated laundry machines. Free Wi-Fi is available and an in-room massage can be arranged. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Shimo Itabashi Train Station and Shin Itabashi Subway Station. Ikebukuro is a 5-minute train ride away, while Sunshine City Aquarium is 15 minutes away. It takes 15 minutes by train to the Togenuki Jizo statue. The rooms at Itabashi APA Hotel Tokyo are equipped with both air conditioning and heating facilities as well as an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room features a fridge, an electric kettle and a bathroom with a bathtub.

name: The Royal Park Hotel Tokyo Haneda Airport Terminal 3
description: With its lobby located next to the departure floor of Haneda Airport, The Royal Park Hotel Tokyo Haneda is accessible from the airport's International Terminal. The property offers a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. It has a business centre and a bar, while currency exchange and dry cleaning services are also available. The on-site restaurant TAILWIND offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. Shinagawa Station is a 11-minute ride away by the Airport Rapid Limited Express train, and Hamamatsucho is a 13-minute ride away by the Tokyo Monorail Haneda Express. Shibuya can be accessed by taking the Keikyu Line to Shinagawa, then transferring to the JR Line. The room features air conditioning, soundproofing, an LCD TV with satellite channels and movies on demand, a fridge and safe. Storage space for luggage and an electric kettle are provided, and the attached bathroom includes a bathtub, shower and toilet. Special amenities and services for the Premium Floor rooms include special towels, pyjamas, beauty supplies and a coffee maker. Guests can also enjoy a free coffee take out service if they are scheduled for an international flight after check-out. In addition, guests can read the Nikkei Shinbun or Wall Street Journal newspapers for free.

name: Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel, A Pan Pacific Partner Hotel
description: Centrally located in Shibuya, Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel offers spacious rooms with panoramic city views. The hotel features a fitness centre and a range of dining options. The Cerulean Tower is just a 5-minute walk away from Shibuya Station, providing access to many train and subway lines. From there it is a 2-minute train ride to Harajuku and the Meiji Jingu Shrine. Overlooking the greater metropolitan area, all rooms are located on the 19th floor and above. They feature air conditioning, a desk, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath, shower and free toiletries including toothbrushes, shampoo, conditioner and body soap. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Guests at Tokyu Hotel Cerulean Tower can unwind in the sauna or hot tub, or enjoy a treatment in the beauty salon. The many other facilities include a pastry shop and a nursery. Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel boasts 8 restaurants, serving Japanese, Chinese and French cuisine. Beverages can be savoured at the top floor bar, the Garden Lounge and the Jazz Club.

name: Toggle Hotel Suidobashi Tokyo
description: In a prime location in Tokyo, toggle hotel suidobashi TOKYO offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 500 metres from Misaki Inari Shrine. The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at toggle hotel suidobashi TOKYO have a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at toggle hotel suidobashi TOKYO. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Japan-China Friendship Centre Art Museum, Ramla Shopping Mall and Tsukudo Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from toggle hotel suidobashi TOKYO.

name: Shibuya Excel Hotel Tokyu
description: Directly connected to Shibuya Train Station, Shibuya Excel Hotel Tokyu offers easy transportation links, 2 high-floor restaurants and comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a satellite flat-screen TV. Overlooking Shibuya Scramble intersection, the hotel is just a 3-minute walk to the famous Shibuya 109 Building. The Harajuku area and Yoyogi Park are a 15-minute walk away. Shibuya Station’s 6 train lines and 3 subway lines offer convenient transport. Rooms at Hotel Shibuya Excel feature a calm, sophisticated decor. Each is fitted with a satellite TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can sip a fresh cup of tea and enjoy city views. Excel Tokyu Shibuya Hotel’s 24-hour front desk offers fax/photocopying services and luggage storage. Guests can relax with a massage or sleep in and have an in-room breakfast. The lobby has free Wi-Fi. Shunsai Japanese Restaurant and French Restaurant A Bientot offer fine dining with panoramic 25th-floor views of Tokyo. The spacious and bright Estacion Cafe serves coffee and cake.

name: Hotel New Otani Tokyo The Main
description: Surrounded by a beautiful 400-year old Japanese garden, Hotel New Otani Tokyo is situated in central Tokyo and offers comfortable accommodation less than a 10-minute walk from 5 subway lines. New Otani Hotel is just 300 metres from Akasaka-Mitsuke Subway Station. From this station the Ginza, Shibuya and Shinjuku areas can all be reached in less than a 10-minute subway ride. The room has large full-height windows that extend from the foot to the ceiling with a sense of openness. Some rooms have views of the hotel's Japanese garden or Shinjuku New City Centre. Hotel New Otani features an incredible 37 dining options, ranging from international cuisine to authentic Japanese dishes – everything from French and Italian to tempura and teppanyaki.

name: Royal Park Hotel The Shiodome, Tokyo
description: Conveniently situated within a 3-minute walk from Shinbashi and Shiodome stations, The Royal Park Iconic Tokyo Shiodome is modern and stylish accommodation. It provides a luxurious spa and a free-use fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Located above the 24th floor and offering city views, the spacious guestrooms at The Royal Park Iconic Tokyo Shiodome feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge and an air purifier/humidifier. Guests can enjoy a soak in the stylish en suite bathroom. A safe and toiletries are also included. Popular Ueno and Asakusa areas are within a 15-minute subway ride from Shinbashi Station. Shiodome Station offers direct subway links to lively Shinjuku and Roppongi areas. Shinbashi Station also provides a direct 35-minute train access to Haneda Airport. This hotel features earthquake-absorbent structures and offers a business centre and coin launderette. International cuisines are offered at the hotel’s on-site restaurants, including restaurant Harmony. The Bar located on the 24th floor offers drinks on tap and skyline views.

name: The Royal Park Canvas -Ginza Corridor
description: In Tokyo (Ginza) With a stay at The Royal Park Canvas -Ginza Corridor in Tokyo (Ginza), you'll be a 5-minute drive from Tokyo Imperial Palace and 9 minutes from Tokyo Tower. This hotel is 4.3 mi (6.9 km) from Tokyo Dome and 11.3 mi (18.2 km) from Tokyo Disneyland®. This hotel offers designated smoking areas. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and an elevator. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Tokyo Takarazuka Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Ginza Six - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Tokyo Midtown Hibiya - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi Hibiya Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Ginza Wako Building - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Imperial Garden Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi Tokyo International Forum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Kabuki-za Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Shinbashi Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Nakagin Capsule Tower - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Tsukiji Outer Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi Marunouchi Building - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Tokyo Imperial Palace - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi Shiki Theatre JIYU - 2 km / 1.3 mi Suntory Hall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi The nearest airports are: Haneda Airport (HND) - 19.7 km / 12.2 mi Narita Intl. Airport (NRT) - 67.1 km / 41.7 mi At The Royal Park Canvas -Ginza Corridor, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Make yourself at home in one of the 161 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have hair dryers and toothbrushes and toothpaste. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Smile Hotel Shinagawasengakujiekimae
description: Attractively located in Tokyo, Smile Hotel Shinagawasengakujiekimae features an Asian breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 700 metres from Shogenji Temple, 700 metres from Hotokuji Temple and 500 metres from Kamezuka Park. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Ruins of Takanawa Okido Gate. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms at Smile Hotel Shinagawasengakujiekimae have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The reception at the accommodation can provide tips on the area. Popular points of interest near Smile Hotel Shinagawasengakujiekimae include Dououji Temple, Chabad Lubavitch of Japan Synagogue and Shinsei Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Shibuya Stream Excel Hotel Tokyu
description: Conveniently set in Tokyo, Shibuya Stream Excel Hotel Tokyu provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At Shibuya Stream Excel Hotel Tokyu each room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Moyai Statue, Shibuya Station and Konno Hachimangu Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from Shibuya Stream Excel Hotel Tokyu.

name: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku
description: Open from April 2015, Hotel Gracery Shinjuku offers comfortable rooms, free WiFi and a restaurant, only a 5-minute walk from JR Shinjuku Station’s east exit. Seibu Shinjuku Station is a 3-minute walk. Rooms in natural colours have built-in air cleaning, a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The toilet is separate from the bathroom, which offers a bathtub, shower, slippers and free toiletries including toothbrushes. Hotel Gracery has a 24-hour reception, and it offers dry cleaning, laundry and ironing services. Multilingual concierge service is provided. The information corner features a currency exchange machine. A Japanese-style and Western breakfast buffet is served on the ground floor restaurant. Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden is a 15-minute stroll from Gracery Hotel, while Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building is a 7-minute drive. Shinjuku Golden Gai is 6 minutes on foot. The hotel terrace has the symbol of Shinjuku, Godzilla Head. If you stay at the hotel, you can see the powerful giant Godzilla head up close.

name: Hotel Mystays Premier Akasaka
description: Hotel Mystays Premier Akasaka is a 4-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station on the Chiyoda Line. Rooms are furnished with modern interior and feature free WiFi. Private parking is also available at a surcharge. All rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, fridge, electric kettle and an air purifier. Slippers, nightwear and free toiletries are also provided. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub and a hairdryer. Guests can get away from the hustle and bustle of the city after a day of sightseeing or working on the terrace or relax with a massage treatment. The 24-hour front desk at Hotel Mystays Premier Akasaka offers free luggage storage. You will find a free fitness centre and restaurant on site. Various dining options are located within a 5-minute walk, and there is a convenience store on the ground floor. Popular attractions including the Mori Art Museum, Imperial Palace and Tokyo Tower are approximately 25-minutes away by public transport. Haneda Airport can be reached with a 50-minute train ride.

name: Ele Cabin Shinjuku Kabukicho
description: No description found

name: Smile Hotel Nihombashi - Mitsukoshimae
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Mitsukoshimae Subway Station, Smile Hotel Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae offers simple accommodations. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests can enjoy VOD channels on the flat-screen TV for an extra cost and request for in-room massages. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute train ride away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a safety deposit box, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. Bottled mineral water, Japanese Yukata robes and slippers are provided for all guests. Free-use PC is available at the lobby. A coin-launderette is on site and dry cleaning services are offered at the 24-hour front desk. Luggage storage and photocopying services are available as well. A breakfast buffet featuring Japanese dishes are served at the dining room. Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae Smile Hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Imperial Palace and a 20-minute subway ride from Akihabara Station. Tokyo Dome is a 25-minute train ride away.

name: Asakusa View Hotel Annex Rokku
description: Set in Tokyo, 200 metres from Edo Taito Traditional Crafts Center, Asakusa View Hotel Annex Rokku offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 300 metres from Asakusa ROX Shopping Center, and within 7 km of the city centre. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kinryu Park, Asakusa Public Hall and Drum Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 23 km from Asakusa View Hotel Annex Rokku.

name: Mercure Tokyo Haneda Airport
description: Located within a 10 minute drive from Haneda Airport, Mercure Tokyo Haneda Airport welcomes travellers with 363 contemporary guestrooms, an all-day dining restaurant, a bar, fitness center, three meeting rooms and two lounges for guests and crews. The overall design will take visitors through the evolving periods of Tokyo from the past to the future with the concept of "Tokyo Electric". The design elements highlight the delicacy of tradition and handicraft and the history of the Haneda neighbourhood.accorhotels.com

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Shimbashi Hibiyaguchi
description: Just a 2-minute walk from Shimbashi Station, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Shimbashi Hibiyaguchi offers simple rooms, a free-use internet PC at the lobby and free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. Free amenities like bath salts and tea are available at the 24-hour front desk. Shimbashi Station connects in 2 minutes to Ginza, in 15 minutes to Shibuya and Shinjuku, and in 22 minutes to the Tokyo Sky Tree tower. Uchisaiwaicho Station is a 3-minute walk from the hotel. Compact rooms at the Shimbashi Fresa Inn feature a contemporary interior with a wall-mounted LCD TV, a desk and a small cool box. Nightwear, toiletries and slippers are provided. Facilities at the Fresa Sotetsu Inn Shimbashi include drinks vending machines and a launderette, while a 24-hour convenience shop can be found on the first floor. Rental amenities include a laptop PC, a shoe dryer and a facial steamer. Wheelchairs are available at a charge. Restaurant Otoya serves a simple and authentic Japanese breakfast. Guests who plan to arrive after 01:00 must inform the property in advance. Contact details can be found in the booking confirmation. If the property is not informed, the booking may be treated as a no-show.

name: Ochanomizu Inn
description: Located just a 3-minute walk from JR Ochanomizu Station, this hotel offers compact guest rooms that went through a renovation in October 2010. Free WiFi is available in all areas, and guests can enjoy complimentary coffee and tea at the lobby during their stay. The hotel is a 2-minute walk from Kanda Myojin Shrine. Lively Akihabara Electric Town is a 5-minute walk, and Tokyo Dome a 10-minute train ride from the property. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle and a fridge. The bathroom comes with a bathtub and free toiletries. The Ochanomizu Inn Hotel features drinks vending machines and internet PCs at an additional charge. Massages can be requested for a fee. On-site Chimuni restaurant offers Japanese or Western breakfast, as well as lunch and dinner.

name: The Gate Hotel Ryogoku by Hulic
description: No description found

name: Park Hotel Tokyo
description: Featuring stunning views of Tokyo and a convenient location just steps from Shiodome Subway Station, Park Hotel Tokyo offers stylish accommodation with free WiFi. Rooms feature large picture windows. Each includes exclusive THANN amenities. Guests can relax and enjoy sweeping city views. Park Hotel Tokyo is only a 10-minute walk to Hamarikyu Gardens. Shinbashi Train Station is 300 metres away, and Tsukiji Fish Market and the Ginza shopping area are both just a 5-minute taxi ride from the hotel. An in-room massage service is available to help guests unwind. Park Hotel Tokyo also offers a fully equipped concierge services. The hotel offers 3 food and beverage options, including Hanasanshou (Japanese cuisine). A cafe, lounge and bar are also located on-site.

name: Keio Presso Inn Akasaka
description: Conveniently situated just a 3-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station, this newly opened hotel is within a 10-minute train ride from popular business and entertainment districts, such as Shibuya, Ginza and Roppongi. Keio Presso Inn Akasaka offers simple yet stylish guest rooms, free WiFi access. Each room is air conditioned and furnished with a fridge, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom features a bath, free toiletries, and a shower toilet. A hairdryer, slippers and a humidifying air purifier are also on offer. Guests will find vending machines, a coin launderette, and a 24-hour front desk at Keio Akasaka Presso Inn. A free breakfast featuring a variety of salads, breads and beverages is available at the café lounge on the ground floor. A variety of restaurants, cafes and convenience stores can also be found just a few steps away from the hotel. The popular shopping complex of Roppongi Hills is a 6-minute taxi ride away, while Tokyo Tower and the Imperial Palace are both a 9-minute taxi ride away. The serene Meiji Jingu Shrine can be accessed via a 7-minute subway ride (to Harajuku Subway Station) followed by a 5-minute walk.

name: Nohga Hotel Akihabara Tokyo
description: Ideally set in the centre of Tokyo, NOHGA HOTEL AKIHABARA TOKYO features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from TKP Garden City Premium Akihabara. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At NOHGA HOTEL AKIHABARA TOKYO the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near NOHGA HOTEL AKIHABARA TOKYO include Akihabara Convention Hall, Yushima Seido and Fujisoft Akiba Plaza. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinjuku gyoemmae eki 3 ban Deguchi
description: In a prime location in the centre of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinjuku gyoemmae eki 3 ban Deguchi provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Genkyoji Temple is 600 metres from the hotel and Place of Mokichi Saito's Death is 700 metres away. At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinjuku gyoemmae eki 3 ban Deguchi all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinjuku gyoemmae eki 3 ban Deguchi include Takatsukisan Chozenji Temple, Taiso-ji Temple and Tayasu Chingo Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Designers Hotel Siesta
description: Ideally situated in the Taito district of Tokyo, Designers Hotel Siesta is situated 700 metres from Kanaami Inari Shrine, 700 metres from Izumi Park and 700 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 600 metres from Convention Room AP Akihabara, and within 5.3 km of the city centre. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, all rooms at Designers Hotel Siesta have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Designers Hotel Siesta include Kusawakeinari Shrine, Sakuma Park and Fujisoft Akiba Plaza. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hyatt Tokyo
description: Grand Hyatt Tokyo is an award-winning luxury hotel centrally located in Roppongi Hills, a multi-use complex housing shops, restaurants, a cinema, art museum and observatory. Roppongi Station is just a 3-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and guests also have access to the business centre on site. The stylish and modern rooms incorporate warm wood furnishings and Japanese aesthetics into the design. All rooms feature a private bathroom with a rain shower and deep soaking limestone bathtub that allows guests to relax after a long day. In addition, the room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, safety deposit box, laptop charger, minibar and Japanese yukata robes. Complimentary mineral water bottles are provided. A range of services are available at the concierge desk and currency exchange is provided at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy spa treatments and massages at the Nagomi Spa and Fitness Center or relax by the indoor swimming pool that utilises natural stone designs. Grand Hyatt Tokyo offers 10 restaurants and bars that feature a variety of international cuisine including French, Italian, Chinese, steak meals, Japanese sushi, teppanyaki and seasonal kaiseki cuisine. Guests can enjoy dining at one of the open-air terraces or listen to live music in the jazz lounge Maduro. Tokyo Grand Hyatt is a 40-minute bus ride from Haneda Airport and a 90-minute ride from Narita Airport on the limousine bus (charges apply). Tokyo Station is a 25-minute train ride away.

name: Shizutetsu Hotel Prezio Tokyo Tamachi
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, Shizutetsu Hotel Prezio Tokyo Tamachi is located in Tokyo, less than 1 km from Shibaura Chuo Park and a 16-minute walk from Ruins of Takanawa Okido Gate. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.1 km from Mita Kasuga Shrine, and within 3.6 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Popular points of interest near Shizutetsu Hotel Prezio Tokyo Tamachi include Daizoji Temple, Jissoji Temple and Dououji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Agora Tokyo Ginza
description: Ideally located in Tokyo, Agora Tokyo Ginza offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Nihon Tenji Seitei no Chi. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Agora Tokyo Ginza all rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near Agora Tokyo Ginza include Nissan Crossing, Coicorin Statue and Ginza Station. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: the b akasaka-mitsuke
description: Located in Tokyo, The B Tokyo Akasaka-Mitsuke offers stylish, 3-star accommodation close to Akasaka. It also provides laundry facilities, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The hotel treats guests to a wake-up service, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at The B Tokyo Akasaka-Mitsuke are air conditioned and soundproofed for guest comfort. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with bathrobes. The B Tokyo Akasaka-Mitsuke has a conveniently located in-house café where guests can grab a bite to eat before heading out to explore the local area. The hotel is close to Akasaka Metro Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Tokyo and its surrounding areas. The National Diet Library and Akasaka Sacas are a short walk away.Revato

name: The Peninsula Tokyo
description: The Peninsula Tokyo pampers its guests with a spa centre and a fitness club with a swimming pool and sun loungers, overlooking the Imperial Palace Gardens. It's a 3-minute walk from Ginza shopping district, and offers concierge services. Tokyo Station is just a 5-minute drive away. Featuring designs with traditional Japanese influences, luxurious rooms boast a living area with sofas and a wide-screen TV, a bedroom with bed-side curtain controls and a marble bathroom with built-in flat-screen TV. They come with a dressing area, mood lighting and free WiFi. Guests can relax with a massage or beauty treatment, or unwind in a sauna or an aromatherapy shower. Services include a personal trainer while airport transfer by Rolls-Royce limousine is provided at a charge. There is a 24-hour front desk. Paid parking is available on site. A variety of restaurants at The Tokyo Peninsula cater Japanese, Cantonese and Western cuisines. Authentic high tea can be enjoyed at cafe The Lobby, while on the 24th floor Peter: The Bar offers cocktails, creative cuisine and sweeping Tokyo views. The Peninsula Tokyo is directly connected to Hibiya Subway Station. Ginza and Yurakucho stations are both within a 3-minute walk, offering easy access to Shinjuku, Shibuya and Roppongi. Tokyo Sky Tree and Asakusa are 40 minutes away by train. Airport buses take 40 minutes to Haneda Airport, and 90 minutes to Narita Airport.

name: Hotel Mystays Premier Hamamatsucho
description: Situated a 5-minute walk from JR Hamamatsucho Station, Hotel Mystays Premier Hamamatsucho offers spacious guest rooms and free WiFi. Haneda Airport is a 20-minute monorail ride away from the station. A 24-hour front desk offers free luggage storage. Each comfortable room features relaxing colours and comes with a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels and air purifier. A hairdryer and toiletries are included in the en suite bathroom. An electric kettle and a fridge is available in the rooms. Nightwear and memory foam pillow is provided for guest's comfort. A paid private parking is available on site (a paid partner parking is available for vehicles with a height of 155 cm, width of 182 cm and length of 530 cm). For those who drive beyond the limit, a partner parking is available at an additional cost. In room paid massage is available for guests after a day or sightseeing or business. The on-site Japanese-style restaurant "Morimoto" offers breakfast consisting of various Japanese and Western dishes at a surcharge. Daimon Subway Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and offers direct subway access to Roppongi, a 5-minute ride away. Tokyo Tower is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Alfit Hotel & Bar Akasaka
description: Rooms Stay in one of 52 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Property Location With a stay at Hotel REX Akasaka Tokyo in Tokyo (Akasaka), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Imperial Palace. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Tokyo Midtown and 3.8 mi (6 km) from Tokyo Dome. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: The city tax ranges from JPY 100-200 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 10,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo - Shiodome
description: Located just a short walk from Nippon Television, Hotel Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo-Shiodome provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Tokyo. The various amenities this modern hotel has to offer include meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. This stylish hotel offers laundry facilities, a 24-hour business centre and a safe. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. All rooms feature a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They each offer a flat-screen TV, slippers and a desk. Tokyo's popular attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Hotel Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo-Shiodome, with Shiodome and Shiodome Media Tower only a short walk away. Shinbashi, Tokyo Electric Power Company and World Trade Center are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Allamanda Aoyama Tokyo
description: Open from June 2016, Hotel Allamanda Aoyama is conveniently located a 1-minute walk from Gaienmae Subway Station on the Ginza Line. It boasts spacious rooms with elegant decor, a spa centre, sauna and a bar. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Guests can enjoy shopping at the Omotesando and Harajuku areas, a 10-minute walk from the property. Nezu Museum is 900 metres from Hotel Allamanda Aoyama, while Mori Art Museum is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 14 km from the property. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath and bidet. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hotel guests can use the fitness gym, sauna and big bath free of charge and the swimming pool can be used at an extra cost.

name: Tokyo Marriott Hotel
description: Feel completely at home at Tokyo Marriott Hotel. Welcoming you to Japan with the perfect blend of style and substance, our hotel is located near Shinagawa Station, while our proximity to the peaceful Gotenyama Garden provides a sense of serenity in the heart of bustling central Tokyo. Relax in restorative hotel rooms and suites with pillowtop bedding, sleek bathrooms and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Some accommodations feature views of Tokyo Bay and the city, and upgraded rooms and suites provide access to the exclusive Executive Lounge. You can also enjoy a meal at Lounge & Dining G, our sophisticated restaurant. If you're hosting an event in Shinagawa, we offer a selection of striking spaces, including two breathtaking ceremony venues, the beautiful Gotenyama Ballroom and several high-tech conference rooms. Expect an exceptional stay at Tokyo Marriott Hotel.Marriott

name: Keikyu Ex Inn Tokyo Nihombashi
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 142 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains and in-room massages, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Property Location With a stay at KEIKYU EX INN TOKYO NIHOMBASHI / Opening on April 7th 2020 in Tokyo (Chuo), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Suitengu Shrine and Tokyo Imperial Palace. This hotel is 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Tsukiji Outer Market and 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from Nippon Budokan. Dining At KEIKYU EX INN TOKYO NIHOMBASHI / Opening on April 7th 2020, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Full breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: The city tax ranges from JPY 100-200 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 10,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for full breakfast: JPY 800 per person (approximately) Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability, amount varies) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability, amount varies) The above list may not be comprehensive. name: NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara
description: Attractively situated in Tokyo, NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara features an American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Kusawakeinari Shrine. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sakuma Park, Kanaami Inari Shrine and Izumi Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara.

name: N Plus Hotel Akihabara
description: Attractively located in the Taito district of Tokyo, N Plus Hotel Akihabara is situated 400 metres from Izumi Park, 400 metres from Kanaami Inari Shrine and 400 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and room service. The property is 4.9 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Fujisoft Akiba Plaza. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the hotel have a balcony. At N Plus Hotel Akihabara rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. N Plus Hotel Akihabara offers a sun terrace. Round-the-clock advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Japanese, Vietnamese and Chinese. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Convention Room AP Akihabara, Kusawakeinari Shrine and Sakuma Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from N Plus Hotel Akihabara.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Shimbashi-Karasumoriguchi
description: Conveniently located a 5-minute walk from JR Shimbashi Station, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Shimbashi-Karasumoriguchi offers compact guest rooms fitted with free WiFi. Air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom. An electric kettle is also included. The bathroom has a bath tub and free toiletries. Guests at Sotetsu Fresa Inn Shimbashi-Karasumoriguchi can use coin launderette on the 4th floor. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and drinks vending machines. Luggage storage is also available. Popular Ginza district is a 7-minute walk from the hotel. Both Tokyo Tower and Tsukiji Fish Market can be reached within an 8-minute drive or taxi ride. Haneda Airport is a 30-minute monorail and train ride away. On-site Renoir café offers light breakfast and coffee.

name: the b akasaka
description: Located in Tokyo, The B Akasaka offers stylish, 3-star accommodation close to Akasaka Sacas. It provides free wireless internet in public areas, a 24-hour reception and massages. This modern hotel offers luggage storage, laundry facilities and a designated smoking area. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at The B Akasaka are air conditioned and soundproofed for guest comfort. They feature a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are prepared every day at Pizzeria Liana, as are Japanese and Italian specialties. The hotel is situated just a 10-minute walk from Akasaka. It is within walking distance of Roppongi Metro Station and Akasaka-mitsuke Subway Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: Hotel Risveglio Akasaka
description: Open from December 2015, Hotel Risveglio Akasaka is located just a 2-minute walk from Akasaka Mitsuke Station on the Marunouchi Line. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property and there is a restaurant on-site. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units feature a seating area for your convenience. The rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Breakfast is served at the on-site restaurant. The lively Shibuya district is a 8-minute train ride from the nearby subway station. Chidorigafuchi is 1.6 km from Hotel Risveglio Akasaka, while Japan Imperial Palace is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Haneda Airport, 14 km from the property.

name: Hotel Intergate Tokyo Kyobashi
description: Open from 1 April 2018 and located within an 11-minute walk of Marunouchi Building and an 18-minute walk of Kachidoki Bridge, Hotel Intergate Tokyo Kyobashi offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Tokyo. This 3-star hotel offers a restaurant. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Japan Imperial Palace is 1.9 km from Hotel Intergate Tokyo Kyobashi, while National Diet Building is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Akasaka Granbell Hotel
description: Conveniently located just a 2-minute walk from Akasaka-Mitsuke Subway Station, design hotel Granbell Akasaka boasts modern rooms with a spacious en suite bathing area. A complimentary Continental breakfast is served, and free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. Dark wood highlights and touches of Japanese design add warmth to the air-conditioned rooms at Granbell Hotel Akasaka. You can make hot green tea and watch the LCD TV. Akasaka Sacas shopping mall is a 4-minute walk, and both Akasaka and Nagatacho subway stations are within a 8-minute walk. Nearby Akasaka-Mitsuke Station offers direct subway access to Shinjuku, Tokyo and Shibuya stations within 10 minutes, and lively Roppongi is just an 8-minute subway ride away. Laptops and DVD players can be borrowed at the reception, which can also arrange dry cleaning services. The hotel has its own theatre. British-style pub The Mermaid is on the ground floor, and Yamadenmaru offers Japanese cuisine on the first floor. The free Continental breakfast is set out at the lobby but must be eaten in guests’ rooms. Narita Airport is a 70-minute train ride away, while Haneda Airport is a 45-minute train ride from Akasaka Granbell Hotel.

name: Imperial Hotel, Tokyo
description: Situated in a central location with 3 stations within a 5-minute walk, Imperial Hotel Tokyo is a prestigious hotel renowned for providing first-class hospitality for over a century since 1890. It features a fitness centre, an indoor swimming pool and a beauty massage salon. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The nearby Ginza, Hibiya and Yurakucho stations offer direct access to various locations in Tokyo. Imperial Palace and Ginza area are both a 5-minute walk away, while Tokyo International Forum is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Popular Tsukiji Fish Market is just a 7-minute drive or taxi ride away. Direct airport limousine buses to/from Narita and Haneda airports are available at an extra charge. Rooms at Tokyo Imperial Hotel are elegantly decorated, and come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a small fridge and a seating area. Free tea set and a newspaper are offered. The en suite bathroom includes toiletries and bathrobes. Guests can enjoy a workout at the fitness gym or in the pool at an extra charge. A variety of shops are available on site, including hair salons, a flower shop and a newsstand. Chargeable in-room massages can be arranged. The Imperial Hotel offers wide range of dining options with 13 restaurants and 3 bars, like Les Saisons French restaurant and Kamon Teppanyaki restaurant. The Imperial Viking Sal serves a lavish buffet, while cocktails and whiskeys can be enjoyed at Old Imperial Bar.

name: Hotel Kazusaya
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Tokyo, Hotel Kazusaya is within 200 metres of Ryoshainari Shrine and 200 metres of Daiichi Sankyo Kusuri Museum. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Popular points of interest near Hotel Kazusaya include Yanagi Inari Shrine, COREDO Muromachi 1 and Takarada Ebisu Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Far East Village Hotel Ariake, Tokyo
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, Far East Village Hotel Tokyo Ariake is set in Tokyo, 1.9 km from Gas Science Museum and 1.6 km from Tokyo Water Science Museum. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and free shuttle service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Odaiba Beach. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Ariake West Terminal Park is 1.9 km from Far East Village Hotel Tokyo Ariake, while DECKS Tokyo Beach is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Otemachi
description: The 2.5-star Toyoko Inn Tokyo Metro Otemachi A1 offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Tokyo. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, Wi-Fi in public areas, newspapers, dry cleaning, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer humidifier, towels, slippers, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless to ensure a restful night. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Metro Otemachi A1 combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tokyo unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hotel Mystays Kiyosumi Shirakawa
description: Just 10 minutes' walk from Kiyosumi-shirakawa Metro Station, Flexstay Inn Kiyosumi-Shirakawa has an accessible setting, making it an ideal base when visiting Tokyo. It also provides laundry facilities, a lift and a laundry service. The hotel has 55 rooms offering all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Flexstay Inn Kiyosumi-Shirakawa is close to Morishita Railway Station, making it easy for guests to discover Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Ueno Park, Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Skytree Tower are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Andaz Tokyo Toranomon Hills - a concept by Hyatt
description: Opened in June 2014, Andaz Tokyo, the 12th hotel of the Andaz brand by Hyatt features a spa, a fitness centre and an indoor pool with a view. This completely non-smoking, 5-star hotel is centrally located just a 15-minute walk from Tokyo Tower and an 18-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. Toranomon Subway Station is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms at Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt include free WiFi access, complimentary snacks, soft drinks and other non-alcoholic beverages from the minibar, and a modern en suite bathroom with hairdryer. A flat-screen TV and free domestic phone calls are also included. Next to the Andaz Lounge on the 51st floor is the main dining venue, The Tavern - Grill & Lounge. Guests will be served refined European provincial cuisine cooked with fresh Japanese produces. The roof-top bar on the 52nd floor offers breathtaking views of the city. Andaz, meaning 'personal style' in Hindi, offers a variety of facilities and services. Guests can get a soothing massage at a surcharge, order room service or relax in the sauna. Laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt is located within an 18-minute walk from the fancy Ginza district and a 14-minute train ride from the Marunouchi area. Haneda Airport is just 20 km away from the hotel and Narita International Airport can be reached within 1 hour train ride.

name: Hotel Grandbach Tokyo Ginza
description: With a stay at Hotel Grand Bach Tokyo Ginza in Tokyo (Ginza), you'll be a 1-minute drive from Kabuki-za Theatre and 7 minutes from Tokyo Imperial Palace. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and an elevator. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Mystays Gotanda Station
description: Hotel Mystays Gotanda Station is located just a minute's walk from JR Gotanda Station and Gotanda Subway Station on Toei Asakusa Line. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. All rooms are air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. Complete with a refrigerator, guestrooms have an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, some rooms has a bathroom with a bath and hairdryer. Extras include a desk, bed linen and air purifier/humidifier. At Hotel Mystays Gotanda Station, a 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage service. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, laundry facilities and a drinks vending machine. The hotel is a 6-minute train ride from Shinagawa Station, 6 minutes by car from Ebisu Garden Place and a 18-minute walk and train ride from Daikanyama Station. Tokyo Big Site can be reached via a 30-minute train ride and walk. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is 9 km away. Guests may experience some noise since the property is located in front of the station. Guests can use ear plugs are located at the 1F lobby inside the amenity boxes.

name: Jr East Hotel Mets Koenji
description: JR-EAST HOTEL METS KOENJI is conveniently located in the popular Nakano area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, laundromat, taxi service. Non-smoking can be found in selected guestrooms. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Tokyo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at JR-EAST HOTEL METS KOENJI.priceline.com

name: Ddd Hotel
description: Conveniently set in Tokyo, DDD HOTEL provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Asakusa Mitsuke Memorial. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At DDD HOTEL each room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near DDD HOTEL include Hatsunemori Shrine, Hulic Hall and Hulic Conference and Ichogaoka Hachiman Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Omo3 Tokyo Akasaka By Hoshino Resort
address: Hitotsuki Street 4-3-2 Akasaka Omo3 Tokyo Akasaka by Hoshino Resorts, Tokyo 107-0052
description: No description found

name: The Capitol Hotel Tokyu
description: Designed by Kengo Kuma, Capitol Hotel Tokyu boasts 3 restaurants, a 14th-floor indoor pool and direct access to 4 subway lines. Rooms are spacious for Tokyo and have city views. Free WiFi is available in the entire building and paid private parking is available on site. Rooms at Tokyu Capitol Hotel offer a softly lit blend of the old and new, with paper screens and a large flat-screen TV. A minibar and a large private bathroom with a bathtub are included. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer are provided. Guests can look out over Tokyo as they work out at the fitness centre or relax in the hot tub. Carju Rajah TIADO Spa offers massages and the hotel includes a beauty salon, photo studio and other shops. The business centre on the 3rd floor features a computer and photocopying services for guests' convenience. Star Hill Chinese Restaurant serves lunch and dinner in stylish modern settings. Suiren offers various Japanese dishes including teppanyaki, sushi and kaiseki multi-courses. Asian and Western cuisines are available all day at Origami. The Capitol Bar offers mood lighting, natural wood and elegantly served cocktails. The hotel has direct access to the Tameike-sanno and Kokkai-gijido-mae subway stations, which offer direct links to the Shinjuku, Shibuya and Ginza areas. The Imperial Palace is a 5-minute drive, while Roppongi Hills is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Tokyu Stay Shinjuku
description: Opened in May 2015, Tokyu Stay Shinjuku is ideally located in the middle of the lively Shinjuku area and just steps away from Shinjuku Sanchome Subway Station. JR Shinjuku Station is also an 8-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests will also find a 24-hour front desk with free luggage storage services at Shinjuku Tokyu Stay. Fitted with white and light-wood furnishings, all rooms come with a flat-screen TV, fridge and electric kettle. Certain rooms feature a microwave for guest's convenience. An air purifier/humidifier is also provided in each room. The private bathrooms feature a shower, while certain bathrooms are additionally equipped with a bath. Extras include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms includes a washing machine and a tumble dryer. The hotel offers free rental services including trouser press, smartphone charger and DVD player. There are a number of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, as well as Isetan Department Store and movie theatres. Shinjuku Gyoen Park is a 3-minute walk away, while Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

name: Hotel Wing International Select Asakusa Komagata
description: Opening in December 2016, Hotel Wing International Select Asakusa Komagata is just a minute's walk away from Asakusa Station on Toei Asakusa Line. There is a 24-hour front desk and free on-site luggage storage available. Guests can relax at the terrace and enjoy views of Tokyo Skytree and Sumida River on the roof top. All guest rooms include an electric kettle, coffee machine and refrigerator. There is a flat-screen TV with satellite channels included in the rooms. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath, shower, toilet and free toiletries. A hairdryer and slippers are also provided. Dry cleaning and laundry services are available for an additional charge. A trouser press is provided for free. There is a drinks vending machine on site. There are several restaurants within a 2-minute walking distance from the property and a convenience store within a minute's walking distance. Ginza Line at Asakusa Station can be reached in 5-minutes on foot from the property. Guests can take a 10-minute walk to explore Senso-ji Temple and the traditional Japanese-style shops nearby. Tokyo Skytree is a 9-minute train ride away on Toei Asakusa Line. In addition, Ueno Station is a 7-minute train ride away.

name: Hotel Mystays Kamata
description: Located just a five-minute stroll from Kamata Train Station, Hotel Mystays Kamata offers guests an ideal base while visiting Tokyo. It also offers free wireless internet. The hotel features a spa, offering a wide range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy. For added convenience, it provides luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and a safe. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a rain shower, slippers and an oversized bathtub. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a seating area. The area surrounding Hotel Mystays Kamata has a variety of cafés and restaurants. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Keikyu Kamata Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Tokyo - Shinjuku
description: Located in Central Tokyo, this 3-star hotel is a five-minute walk from Kabukicho. Guests can also take advantage of free Wi-Fi throughout their stay. All rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They each offer an alarm clock, slippers and a flat-screen TV. A satisfying breakfast is prepared each morning at Hotel Villa Fontaine Shinjuku, and there are numerous restaurants and eateries close by. Hotel Villa Fontaine Shinjuku is close to Shin-Okubo Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Tokyo and its surrounding areas. The surrounding neighbourhood is also famous for its shopping.Revato

description: Only a 7-minute walk from the Takanawa Exit of JR Shinagawa Station, Shinagawa Tobu Hotel offers modern rooms renovated in 2016. Guests can enjoy Tuscan Italian dishes at the hotel’s restaurant. Haneda Airport is a 20-minute train ride from Keikyu Shinagawa Train Station, which is also a 7-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fridge. Nightwear, toothbrush sets and slippers are provided for all guests. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub. A trouser press and humidifier can be borrowed for in-room use. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage service. Guests can unwind and enjoy free coffee at the common guests' lounge. DA Noi restaurant serves Western breakfast, and Italian dishes for lunch and dinner. Tobu Shinagawa Hotel is a 35-minute train ride from Asakusa area and a 20-minute train ride from Shibuya Station. Narita International Airport is a 90-minute train ride away.

All air-conditioned rooms are individually decorated with neutral, natural features and artworks. Equipped with a seating area with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and fridge, all rooms have either a kitchenette or a fully-equipped kitchen. En suite bathrooms offer a bidet toilet, hairdryer, toothbrushes and free toiletries. Carefully selected weight-optimising mattress is fitted in all rooms. The Kitano Hotel Tokyo offers a bar and 2 restaurants on site. Visit Sushi Oumi, featuring Edo-style sushi. The Imperial Palace moat is a 13-minute walk away, while the National Diet Building and Hie Shrine is a 10-minute walk away. Shibuya Station is 9-minutes and Ginza Station is 14-minute away by metro lines.

name: Bellustar Tokyo, A Pan Pacific Hotel
description: A quiet private space in the city "BELLUSTAR TOKYO, A Pan Pacific Hotel" "BELLUSTAR TOKYO, A Pan Pacific Hotel" is an urban luxury resort where you can enjoy a special space away from the hustle and bustle of the ground. The interior design incorporates traditional Japanese culture, the 7-meter-wide window offers an outstanding view of Tokyo, and the beds in all rooms are made by Slumberland, a company that is a purveyor to the British royal family. Rooms. The top floor has a restaurant with an overwhelming view of the 3-story atrium, a spa where you can experience the blessings of the Japanese land and the four seasons in a superb view, and a penthouse with 5 rooms that welcomes guests with high-quality hospitality. ”. Relax in a unique space with a 360-degree panoramic view.Rakuten

For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. Hotel New Otani Executive House Zen features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Fax/photocopying is also available. Hotel Listel Shinjuku’s Salon et Restaurant Femmenette serves both local specialities and international dishes. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar or order room service.

Akihabara is the stomping ground of Japanese youth culture, with lively streets and shops specializing in consumer electronics, manga and anime. Located less than 400 meters from Suehirocho and Naka-Okachimachi stations on the Tokyo Metro, 60 minutes from Haneda Airport and 70 minutes from Narita Airport, Best Western Hotel Fino Tokyo Akihabara is the perfect option for travelers seeking convenient, comfortable and affordable accommodation in the heart of the city.bestwestern.com

Our 24/7, fully equipped fitness center and on-site restaurant are available to help you maintain your workout routine and appetite on the road, all without leaving our hotel.
