The classically luxurious rooms include a marble en-suite bathroom with deep soaking bathtub. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV and hi-fi audio system. Guests can receive rejuvenating treatments and soak in the open-air heated hot tub and the hot spring bath at the spa. For convenience, the hotel’s business centre and fitness centre are open 24 hours. Overlooking the Chinzanso Gardens, Il Teatro features Venetian chandeliers and Milanese-style Italian dishes. Miyuki offers a range of Japanese cuisine served by staff in kimonos, and international dishes are served at the Bistro. Tokyo Chinzanso Hotel is a 25-minute taxi ride from JR Tokyo Train Station. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Edogawabashi Subway Station.

name: Jr East Hotel Mets Gotanda
description: Well situated in the Shinagawa Ward district of Tokyo, JR-East Hotel Mets Gotanda is set 100 metres from Remy Gotanda Shopping Mall, 600 metres from Yakushi-ji Tokyo Annex Temple and 700 metres from Museum of Package Culture. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Sony History Museum is 1 km from the hotel and Hakone Meissen Antique Museum is less than 1 km away. At the hotel, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. JR-East Hotel Mets Gotanda can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hatakeyama Memorial Museum of Fine Art, Shimazu Family Old Residence and Ohsaki New City Shopping Mall. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 12 km from JR-East Hotel Mets Gotanda.

name: Intercontinental - Ana Tokyo
description: ANA InterContinental Tokyo mirrors the rich diversity of this city. The dynamic buzz of the lobby calls to mind some of Tokyo’s famous street scenes. The hotel’s exceptional food experiences evoke the city’s world-class dining reputation and the urban sophistication of Club InterContinental reflects the sanctuary to be found in the many local temples and shrines here. All this, whilst history is quietly being written inside its elegant Japanese banquet halls.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Forest Hongo by unito
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, フォーレスト本郷 by unito is located in Tokyo, 400 metres from Wadatsumi no Koe Museum and 400 metres from Kikufuji Hotel Remains. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. Staff at the hotel are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Popular points of interest near フォーレスト本郷 by unito include Hoshinji Temple - Bunkyo Ichiyo Memorial Hall, Agricultural Museum The University of Tokyo and Statue of Hachiko & Hidesaburo Ueno. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Mimaru Tokyo Ikebukuro
description: A plethora of fashion and electronic stores alongside delicious Japanese ramen restaurants are waiting for you within walking distance. All 107 rooms feature a PC. A convenient location along the Yamanote line that lends itself well to sightseeing and/or business.Situated in the Toshima district in Tokyo, MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 800 m from Ikebukuro Station, 700 m from Metropolitan Plaza and 800 m from Wacca Ikebukuro. The property is 500 m from Ikebukuro Marui Shopping Center, and within 500 m of the city centre.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO the rooms have bed linen and towels.Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ikebukuro Mitake Shrine, Ikebukuro Nishi-guchi Park and Tobu Department Store Ikebukuro. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 25 km from MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO.Sembo

name: Centurion Hotel Residential Akasaka Station
description: Situated in the heart of Akasaka, Centurion Hotel Residential Akasaka is a 1-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station and a 3-minute walk from Akasaka Mitsuke Subway Station, which provides access to several train lines. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The air-conditioned and heated rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a Slumberland mattress, washing machine and safety deposit box. Guests can use the fridge and electric kettle in the kitchenette. The kitchen items could rent for 1000 yen per day, but just only for the rooms in main building. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower booth and a hairdryer. Nightwear is provided. Guests will find free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner, body wash and facial cleanser at the property. The luggage storage and dry cleaning services are offered at the 24-hour front desk. A WiFi router is available for guests' convenience. Men`s Sauna facilities are situated within 5-minute walk, provide discount coupon for staying guests. The annex cabin tower offers a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a coin laundry service at an extra cost. A WiFi router can be borrowed. Some services differ from that of the main property building. Akasaka Centurion Residential Hotel is a 20-minute train ride from the Imperial Palace and a 5-minute walk from Hie Shrine. TBS TV Station, Akasaka Sacas and various shops are within a 5-minute walk. Tokyo Station is a 15-minute drive and Haneda Airport and Tokyo Disney Resort are a 40-minute train ride away. Narita International Airport is a 75-minute train ride away.

name: Hotel Monday Haneda Airport
description: Relief Premium Haneda Airport is located amongst Tokyo's popular restaurants and cafés, just a short walk from Otorii Station. Guests can also make use of free Wi-Fi. This 3-star hotel offers a safe, a 24-hour reception and laundry facilities. It also provides luggage storage, a currency exchange and bicycle rental. The rooms feature views of the city and include a refrigerator, a shower and a hair dryer. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to have a meal. The hotel also serves breakfast each day. Relief Premium Haneda Airport is within walking distance of Anamori-inari Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. Odaiba is just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Tabard Tokyo
description: Situated 400 metres from Koto-ji Temple, HOTEL TABARD TOKYO offers 3-star accommodation in Tokyo and has a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Located around 500 metres from Sachio Ito Residence Monument, the hotel with free WiFi is also 600 metres away from Sarue Onshi Park. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Tanishiinari Shrine. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At HOTEL TABARD TOKYO the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking English, Japanese and Chinese at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Popular points of interest near HOTEL TABARD TOKYO include Kinshi Park, Kokusan Match Hassho no Chi Monument and Oiteke Horiato Monument. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo
description: Boasting fine restaurants and an award-winning spa on the 37th floor, Mandarin Oriental offers 5-star luxury in the historical Nihonbashi area in the heart of Tokyo. Among the most spacious in Tokyo, rooms feature gorgeous city views. Mitsukoshimae Subway Station and JR Shin-Nihonbashi Train Station are directly connected to the hotel. Rooms at the Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo pair wide windows with chic design inspired by Japanese aesthetics. A full range of modern amenities are offered, including a satellite flat-screen TV. All rooms boast a sofa, seating area and desk, while bathrooms have a large bathtub and separate shower. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Tokyo Stock Exchange and an 8-minute walk from JR Tokyo Station. Ginza area is a 5-minute subway ride and the Imperial Palace is a 3-minute subway ride away. Akihabara Electric Town and the popular Tsukiji Fish Market are both within a 10-minute drive or taxi ride from the property. Guests can work out to city views at the 38th-floor fitness room, or relax in the hot tub or sauna. The spa offers exclusive Asian and Western-fusion treatments in a tranquil setting. The hotel’s concierge helps with sightseeing. Among the hotel’s 9 dining options is Sushi Shin by Miyakawa, offering edomae-style sushi and skyline views. Cantonese and French cuisines also tempt the tongue. Mandarin Bar pours cool cocktails. The Michelin starred Tapas Molecular Bar is open for both lunch and dinner.

name: Centurion Hotel Grand Akasaka
description: Centurion Hotel Grand Akasaka is a convenient 3-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station and a 2-minute walk from Akasakamitsuke Subway Station. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Carpeted designer rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a Slumberland mattress, air conditioning/heating and an en suite bathroom. Each comes with a refrigerator and an electric kettle. In addition, free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner and body wash, as well as a hairdryer can be found in rooms. At Grand Centurion Hotel Akasaka, guests can use the coin launderette, get a massage at a surcharge or get their clothes dry cleaned, also at a surcharge. Public bath/sauna facilities are open to male guests only, The Imperial Palace is a 12-minute walk and train ride away. The fancy shopping district of Ginza is a quick 10-minute train ride and walk away, while Tsukiji Market is a 15-minute taxi ride away.

name: Flexstay Inn Shinagawa
description: Flexstay Inn Shinagawa provides comfortable 3-star accommodation in Tokyo. It also offers luggage storage, a ticket service and a tour desk. Flexstay Inn Shinagawa features 55 air conditioned rooms. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and ample workspace. The hotel is under a 25-minute drive from Haneda Airport. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Tennozu Isle Station and Shinagawa Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: The Tourist Hotel & Cafe Akihabara
description: Located in Tokyo, THE TOURIST HOTEL & Cafe AKIHABARA provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space and free WiFi. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At THE TOURIST HOTEL & Cafe AKIHABARA every room comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Selected rooms feature a private bathroom with a shower and bathtub, while other rooms come with a private shower. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Fujisoft Akiba Plaza, Izumi Park and Kanaami Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 27 km from THE TOURIST HOTEL & Cafe AKIHABARA.

name: Hotel Monte Hermana Tokyo
description: Well situated in the centre of Tokyo, Hotel Monte Hermana Tokyo offers continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Bellesalle Yaesu. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The units will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. Popular points of interest near Hotel Monte Hermana Tokyo include Tokyo Convention Hall, Mitsukoshi Nihonbashi Main Store and Kyobashi no Oyabashira. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Himalaya Cloud Hotel
description: Boasting a garden, terrace, restaurant and free WiFi, Himalaya Cloud Hotel is set in Tokyo, 100 metres from Shosen-ji Temple and 200 metres from Seiganji Temple. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.3 km from Hikawa Park, 1.6 km from Koga Masao Museum of Music and 1.7 km from Shibuya Kuritsu Honcho Park. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and bathrobes. Himalaya Cloud Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Minamidaiicho Park, Tokyo Camii & Turkish Culture Center and Yayoi Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from Himalaya Cloud Hotel.

name: Hotel Resol Ikebukuro
description: Hotel Resol Ikebukuro is only a 2-minute walk from Exit 1 of Higashi Ikebukuro Station on the Yurakucho Subway Line. It offers a modern accommodation with a restaurant, massage services and rooms with free WiFi. JR Ikebukuro Train Station is a 7-minute walk away. Guestrooms are fitted with both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room has a humidifier, a flat-screen TV and a tea set with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a bathtub. Resol Ikebukuro Hotel offers easy access to the Ginza and Roppongi area, both within a 30-minute subway ride away. Guests can take an Airport Limousine Bus from Haneda and Narita Airport to Sunshine City, which is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Narita Airport is a 1-hour ride and Haneda Airport is a 40-minute bus ride away. Il Chianti EST Restaurant serves Italian buffet dishes for breakfast. Drinks can be purchased from the vending machine. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Dry cleaning services are available.

name: The Westin Tokyo
description: Nestled in the quiet, upscale area of Ebisu, The Westin Tokyo welcomes you to the heart of Tokyo, the most metropolitan city in Japan. Offering convenient access to the bustling Shibuya and Roppongi areas, our upscale hotel is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. With its strategic location and thoughtful amenities, our Tokyo, Shibuya hotel is consistently acclaimed among the best hotels in Japan. Our hospitality embodies a modern sophistication that stays true to traditional Japanese values. Classic European décor adorns each room, accompanied by the signature Heavenly Bed to ensure you leave feeling better than when you arrived. Select rooms and suites allow you to enjoy views of the iconic Tokyo Tower and to truly embrace the vibrance of the Japanese capital. Just minutes away from JR Ebisu Station, corporate offices, shopping and entertainment centers, our Tokyo hotel offers one of the best locations in the city, making it a simple decision when considering where to stay in Tokyo.Marriott

name: Jr East Hotel Mets Tokyo Bay Shinkiba
description: JR-EAST HOTEL METS TOKYO BAY SHINKIBA is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tokyo, whether exploring or just passing through. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, laundromat are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Air purifier, clothes rack, complimentary tea, humidifier, linens can be found in selected guestrooms. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, JR-EAST HOTEL METS TOKYO BAY SHINKIBA caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Apa Hotel Keikyu Kamata Ekimae
description: Ideally located in the Ota Ward district of Tokyo, APA Hotel Keikyu Kamata-Ekimae is set 1.2 km from Omori Hachiman Shrine, 1.6 km from Miwa Itsukushima Shrine and 1.9 km from Uramori Inari Shrine. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Tokujo-ji Temple is 2 km from the hotel and Gonsho-ji Temple is 1.9 km away. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. All guest rooms in APA Hotel Keikyu Kamata-Ekimae are fitted with a TV and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. APA Hotel Keikyu Kamata-Ekimae can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Morigasaki Kotsu Park is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Kifune Shrine is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 5 km from APA Hotel Keikyu Kamata-Ekimae.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Jimbocho
description: Located in Central Tokyo, this 3-star hotel is within easy walking distance of Ochanomizu and Meiji University Surugadai Campus. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and laundry facilities. There are a range of facilities on offer to those staying at Hotel Villa Fontaine Jimbocho, such as a laundry service, a vending machine and a lift. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. Hotel Villa Fontaine Jimbocho offers 72 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. A refrigerator, slippers and a flat-screen TV are also provided. A satisfying breakfast is available every morning at the hotel, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. Tokyo's popular attractions are within close proximity to Hotel Villa Fontaine Jimbocho, with Jinbocho just a few minutes away. Guests can also visit Nippon Budokan, Tokyo Dome City Attractions and Yushima Seido.Revato

name: Monday Apart Ueno-Shin-Okachimachi
description: MONday Apart Ueno Shinokachimachi has air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Tokyo, 300 metres from The Shitaya Shrine, 400 metres from Choen-ji Temple and 600 metres from Tokaku-ji Temple. Complimentary WiFi is available and private parking is available on site. The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Ryukoku-ji Temple, Hoon-ji Temple and Rinko-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from MONday Apart Ueno Shinokachimachi.

name: hotel MONday Asakusabashi
description: Ideally situated in Tokyo, hotel MONday Asakusa features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Nitenmon Gate, Asakusa Fujiasama Shrine and Hozomon Gate. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is fitted with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At hotel MONday Asakusa the rooms include bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near hotel MONday Asakusa include Edo Taito Traditional Crafts Center, Kinryu Park and Asakusa ROX Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel 1899 Tokyo
description: Conveniently situated in Tokyo, HOTEL 1899 TOKYO provides 3-star accommodation close to Shinbashi Shiogama Shrine and Seishoji Temple. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, Blu-ray player, and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and some rooms are equipped with city views. At HOTEL 1899 TOKYO each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hibiya Shrine, Sakurada Park and Nan-ou Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 14 km from HOTEL 1899 TOKYO.

name: karaksa hotel colors Tokyo Yaesu
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, karaksa hotel colors Tokyo Yaesu is situated in Tokyo, 600 metres from Tokyo Convention Hall and 500 metres from National Film Archive of Japan. This 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is 700 metres from Yasube Taketsune Horibe Monument, and within 3.5 km of the city centre. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels. At karaksa hotel colors Tokyo Yaesu rooms come with bed linen and towels. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bellesalle Yaesu, Tokyo Shoken Building Inc. And Daimaru Tokyo. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 17 km from karaksa hotel colors Tokyo Yaesu.

name: Gate Stay Premium Ginza Shintomicho
description: MONday Apart Premium 銀座新富町 is set in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, 300 metres from Shintomi Inari Shrine and 500 metres from The Birthplace of Joshiseigakuin. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Gas Light in Chuo Monument, Futaba Gakuen Birthplace Monument and Aoyama Gakuin Memorial Land Monument. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 16 km from MONday Apart Premium 銀座新富町.

name: Karaksa Hotel Tokyo Station
description: Well situated in Tokyo, karaksa hotel TOKYO STATION offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from Bellesalle Yaesu. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At karaksa hotel TOKYO STATION every room includes bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mitsukoshi Nihonbashi Main Store, Daimaru Tokyo and COREDO Muromachi 1. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 18 km from karaksa hotel TOKYO STATION.

name: Hotel Mystays Ueno Iriyaguchi
description: Offering spacious rooms with a kitchenette, free wired internet and a private bathroom, HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi is just a 5-minute walk from JR Ueno Train Station. Free WiFi is availalbe in all areas, and a coin launderette is available on site. Refurbished in 2014, the rooms at HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi offer contemporary comfort. Guests can make a meal with the hot plate and sink, or relax with a video-on-demand movie. An air purifier/humidifier is provided in each room. A private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Luggage can be left at the 24-hour front desk within reception hours (same-day only). You will find drinks vending machines. HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi is only a 3-minute walk from Inaricho Subway Station, offering direct links to the Asakusa and Ginza areas. Ueno Park is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Tokyu Stay Kamata
description: Tokyu Stay Kamata is a 3-minute walk from Keikyu Kamata Train Station, which connects to Haneda Airport. It offers modern spacious guestrooms and free property-wide Wi-Fi. Some rooms feature an in-room washing machine and clothes dryer. The air-conditioned rooms at Tokyu Stay Kamata are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box, a small fridge and an electric kettle. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, which offers free luggage storage. Dry cleaning, photocopying and couriers services are also available for an extra fee. We will serve breakfast with a choice of Japanese food or Western food in your room. Kamata Tokyu Stay is an 8-minute walk from JR Kamata Train Station. Haneda Airport is an 8-minute train ride from the hotel. Shinagawa area is a 7-minute train ride from JR Kamata Station.

name: Dormy Inn Express Meguro Aobadai Hot Spring
description: Located in a quiet neighborhood, hotel Dormy Inn Express Meguro Aobadai Hot Spring offers free wired internet. The property offers bicycle rentals and free use of washing machines. The property offers free Wi-Fi in public areas, vending machines selling drinks and laundry dryers. Guests can refresh in the public baths and the sauna. Dormy Inn Express Meguro Aobadai Hot Spring is a 10-minute walk from Nakameguro Station, offering train and subway connections. From there, it takes just a 5-minute train ride to the downtown area of Shibuya.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza Nanachome
description: Located 8 minutes from Shimbashi Station on foot, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza-Nanachome is a convenient location from where guests can explore Tokyo. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Free luggage storage and a 24-hour front desk are available, and complimentary coffee is provided. Each air-conditioned guest room comes with a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, refrigerator, and electric kettle. Slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer are also offered. Extras include toothbrushes and pajamas. A free-use computer is provided on site. There is also a printer, copy, and fax machine that is available for use upon request. The property is equipped with a coin launderette. A trouser press is available for free. Guests can sample a Japanese-style and Western-style buffet breakfast at a restaurant, for an additional fee. Drinks vending machines that include alcohol are available on site. Kachidoki Bridge on Sumida River is a 20-minute stroll from the hotel. Guests can enjoy shopping at the Marunouchi Building, a 15-minute train ride away on the Marunouchi Line. The property is an 8-minute walk from Higashi-Ginza Station. Haneda Airport is a 50-minute train ride on the Keikyu-Kuko Line from the property.

name: Hotel Monterey Ginza
description: Hotel Monterey Ginza is a 1-minute walk from Ginza-Itchome Subway Station and a 6-minute walk from JR Yurakucho Station. It offers a French restaurant and Western-style rooms with free high-speed wired internet. Free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. Ginza Hotel Monterey is a 5-minute walk from Central Ginza and 3.3 km from Akihabara. It is 6 km from Asakusa and Senso-ji Temple. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with an air humidifier, a fridge, a work desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes equipped with a bathtub and shower. Free toiletries, a hairdryer and slippers are provided. Free high-speed wired internet and WiFi access are available in the guest room. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also available. Parking space is available on site at a charge, if reserved in advance. Escale Restaurant serves a selection of French dishes for lunch and dinner. A Buffet-style breakfast is offered in the Banquet Room.

name: Sutton Place Hotel Ueno
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from Ryukoku-ji Temple, Sutton Place Hotel Ueno features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge. The property is 500 metres from Front gate of Honobo In Kanei-ji Temple, and within 6 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Sutton Place Hotel Ueno rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kissho-in Temple, Gate of Former Residence of Koda Rohan and The Shitaya Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from Sutton Place Hotel Ueno.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Tokyo - Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae
description: Located in Central Tokyo, this hotel is a short stroll from Tokyo Stock Exchange, Mitsukoshi and Bank of Japan. Guests can also make the most of complimentary internet throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a safe, luggage storage and massage services. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Hotel Villa Fontaine Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae has 154 air conditioned rooms. The bathrooms have a bathtub and offer a hair dryer. Hotel Villa Fontaine Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae houses a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. Alternatively, the surrounding neighbourhood provides several bars and restaurants serving a range of varied cuisines. Hotel Villa Fontaine Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae is close to Ningyocho Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Guests can also visit Kanda, INCJ and Nihonbashi.Revato

name: Mercure Tokyo Ginza
description: Mercure Tokyo Ginza offers a convenient location in the shopping district of Ginza, where visitors can discover the latest trends in culture and lifestyle. Situated in close to popular sites such as Kabuki Theater and the Imperial Palace, our hotel is the perfect base to explore the city of Tokyo. Step into our locally inspired hotel, where the design tells the history and story of Ginza, featuring gorgeous display shelves in the lobby reminiscent of boutiques and silver coin motifs in the guestrooms.accorhotels.com

name: Wander Tokyo Shibuya
description: Situated conveniently in the Meguro Ward district of Tokyo, Wander Tokyo Shibuya is located 300 metres from Higashiyama Kaizuka Park, less than 1 km from Sugekari Park and a 8-minute walk from Ikejiri Inari Shrine. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Kamimeguro Hikawa Shrine. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Wander Tokyo Shibuya all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kon Ichikawa Memorial Room, The Shoto Museum of Art and Snowdome Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 18 km from Wander Tokyo Shibuya.

name: One@tokyo
description: ONE@Tokyo offers an entirely non-smoking accommodation in Tokyo, set a 3-minute stroll from Oshiage Subway Station. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar or coffee house. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Tokyo Station is a 30-minute train ride. Free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. A flat-screen TV is available in all rooms. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Each room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries including a toothbrush. Hairdryers are provided. Tokyo Sky Tree Tower is 500 metres from ONE@Tokyo, while Sensoji Temple is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 60-minutes via train and walk. Narita International Airport is 75-minutes via train and walk.

name: The Millennials Shibuya
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from Hachiko Statue, The Millennials Shibuya is an adult only accommodation. The property has a terrace and rooms with free WiFi access. Popular points of interest nearby include NHK Studio Park, Shibuya Center Town and Meiji Jingu Shrine. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge for guests. Each room has a shared bathroom with free toiletries. The hotel offers a business centre for guest use. Nezu Museum is 1.6 km from The Millennials Shibuya. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Tokyo Hibiya
description: Mercure Tokyo Hibiya's interiors offers a contemporary take on traditional theatre design elements, paying homage to the history and culture of Hibiya. The hotel features 178 guestrooms, a restaurant with an outdoor terrace and garden, a fitness centre, an executive lounge with a theatre and cigar room, meeting rooms and other facilities perfect for both business and leisure travellers.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Fukudaya
description: Featuring traditional hot public baths, Hotel Fukudaya is a 15-minute walk or 5-minute bus ride to JR Shibuya Train Station. It offers affordable accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Guests at Fukudaya Hotel can choose between a classically furnished Western room and a Japanese room with tatami (woven-straw) flooring and traditional futon beds. All rooms are air-conditioned. Free drinks such as Japanese tea, kombucha, and coffee are available in the lobby. In addition, a set of yukata, toothbrush, razor, lotion, milky lotion, etc. will be given to customers who request it at the front desk. Hairdryers and electric kettles can be borrowed at the front desk, but there are no refrigerators or microwaves. Keio Shinsen Train Station is a 7-minute walk from the hotel, and the famous Shibuya 109 Building is a 12-minute walk away. The trendy Daikanyama area is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Web Hotel Tokyo Asakusabashi
description: Just 150 metres from Asakusabashi Subway Station, Web Hotel Tokyo Asakusabashi offers non-smoking rooms with free WiFi access and wired internet and a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a hairdryer, free toiletries and a private en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. Tea, coffee and mineral water are provided. JR Asakusabashi Train Station is a 3-minute walk away. Popular points of interest near the property include Kokugikan National Sumo Stadium, Akihabara electronics area and The cultural Asakusa area.

name: Hotel Ann Tsukiji
description: The 2-star Hotel Ann Tsukiji offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Tokyo. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour front desk are there for guest's enjoyment. Flat screen television, carpeting, clothes rack, humidifier, linens can be found in selected guestrooms. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Hotel Ann Tsukiji combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tokyo unforgettable.Agoda

name: Monday Apart Premium Ueno Okachimachi
description: MONday Apart Premium UENO OKACHIMACHI features air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Tokyo, 100 metres from Kamezumiinari Shrine, 400 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park and 400 metres from Convention Room AP Akihabara. Private parking is available on site. Featuring free WiFi, the units have a safety deposit box, a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. There is a private bathroom with bidet in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Fujisoft Akiba Plaza, Akihabara Convention Hall and Matsuzakaya Ueno. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from MONday Apart Premium UENO OKACHIMACHI.

name: Centurion Hotel Ueno
description: Conveniently located a 3-minute walk from Yushima Subway Station and Uenohirokoji Subway Station, Centurion Hotel Ueno offers newly renovated rooms, a cafe and free WiFi. JR Okachimachi Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. Tokyo Station is a 5-minute train ride from JR Okachimachi Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature soft colours and are fitted with a Slumberland mattress, electric kettle, a refrigerator and a flat-screen TV. Each comes with an en suite bathroom, a hairdryer and free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner, body wash and facial cleanser. A coin launderette, drinks vending machines and a free use PC can be found on site. Luggage can be stored for free before/after check-in/check-out at the 24-hour front desk. Portable WiFi routers can be rented at a surcharge. Restaurant Torebi-an specialises in steak and hamburger dishes, including renowned Kuroge-Wagyu beef. Drinks and light meals can be enjoyed at the cafe. The renowned Ameya-Yokocho market is only a 2-minute stroll from the property, where guests can shop, dine or simply explore and enjoy the area. Tokyo Disney Resort can be accessed by a 40-minute train ride from JR Okachimachi Train Station. Both the National Museum of Nature and Science and Ueno Zoo are located within a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: Tokyu Stay Aoyama Premier
description: Featuring stylish rooms with a kitchenette and city views, Tokyu Stay Aoyama Premier is a 2-minute walk from Gaienmae Subway Station. Guest can use the free Wi-Fi at the entire property and enjoy stores/restaurants located at the building's first 2 floors. Rooms are located between the 14th and 25th floors, and guests can relax with stunning views of central Tokyo. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and an in-room washer/dryer. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a small fridge and an electric kettle. Kitchenware is also provided. The Omotesando area is a 10-minute walk away. Shibuya is just 2 subway stops from Gaienmae Station, and Ginza is a direct 15-minute trip in the other direction. Monte Azul on the 2nd floor of Passage Aoyama, located right below the hotel, offers a Western buffet breakfast between 07:00 and 10:00. Italian, Chinese and various other cuisines are offered at the Passage.

name: Loisir Hotel Shinagawa Seaside
description: Well situated in the Shinagawa Ward district of Tokyo, LOISIR HOTEL SHINAGAWA SEASIDE is set 80 metres from Shinagawa Seaside Forest Oval Garden, less than 1 km from Sinagawa Sentaikoujin Temple and a 10-minute walk from Seiun Inari Shrine. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At LOISIR HOTEL SHINAGAWA SEASIDE every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English and Japanese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Samezu Hachiman Shrine, Higashishinagawa Kaijo Park and Tennozu Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 7 km from LOISIR HOTEL SHINAGAWA SEASIDE.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2
description: Ideally situated in the Ota Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2 is situated 1.6 km from Uramori Inari Shrine, 1.9 km from Miwa Itsukushima Shrine and 2.1 km from Omori Hachiman Shrine. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk. Gonsho-ji Temple is 2.6 km away and Tokujo-ji Temple is 3.2 km from the hotel. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2 have air conditioning and a desk. American and Asian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Morigasaki Kotsu Park is 2.3 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2, while Kifune Shrine is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Hotel Hatchobori Ekimae
description: No description found

name: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Takadanobaba
description: Well situated in the Shinjuku Ward district of Tokyo, Sotetsu Grand Fresa Takadanobaba is set 80 metres from Statue of Peace, 400 metres from Tsumami - Kanzashi Museum and 500 metres from Shinjuku Suwa Shrine. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property is close to popular attractions like Hikawa Jinja Shrine, Ryocho-in Temple and Takata Sochinju Hikawa Shrine. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Sotetsu Grand Fresa Takadanobaba can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near Sotetsu Grand Fresa Takadanobaba include Higashiyama Fujiinari Shrine, Otomeyama Park and Philatelic Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Aloft Tokyo Ginza
description: Take your travels to a new level at Aloft Tokyo Ginza. Our Chuo City hotel is in a famous shopping district, a few minutes from Ginza and Higashi Ginza subway stations and near Haneda Airport. Meet & mingle at W XYZ bar, enjoy breakfasts at WAREHOUSE and grab a snack at Roof Dogs, our rooftop bar serving hotdogs. These dining spots turn into red-hot hangouts thanks to Live@Aloft, our live acoustic performances featuring local and emerging artists from Ginza, Tokyo. Perk up at our 24-hour fitness center with treadmills, ellipticals, free weights, studio mats and recumbent bikes or retreat to a contemporary hotel room or suite with ultra-comfortable beds, walk-in rainfall showers, 55-inch 4K TVs and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy downtown Tokyo with Aloft Tokyo Ginza.Marriott

name: The Lively Tokyo Azabujuban
description: The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN is well set in the centre of Tokyo, and provides a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Daiho-ji Temple. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. A seating area is available in all units, while selected rooms include a Blu-ray player. At The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. With staff speaking English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese, guidance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN include Choden-ji Temple, Kenso-ji Temple and Juban Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho
description: Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho is conveniently located in the popular Tokyo Tower area. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Car park, meeting facilities, babysitting, restaurant, laundry service are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Tokyo Hotel Bella Ikebukuro
description: Located in the centre of Tokyo, 300 metres from Ikebukuro Mitake Shrine, Hotel Bella provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Ikebukuro Station, Metropolitan Plaza and Nishi-Ikebukuro Park. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. Guest rooms in the inn are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Hotel Bella include Ikebukuro Marui Shopping Center, Ikebukuro Nishi-guchi Park and Tobu Department Store Ikebukuro. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Kanda Otemachi
description: Attractively located in Tokyo, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Kanda-Otemachi features a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Kanda Children's Park. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms at Sotetsu Fresa Inn Kanda-Otemachi have air conditioning and a desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tokiwa Park, Bellesalle Kanda and Yanagi Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from Sotetsu Fresa Inn Kanda-Otemachi.

name: Miyako City Tokyo Takanawa
description: Miyako City Tokyo Takanawa offers city view rooms in Tokyo and offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. There is a restaurant on site for guest's convenience. Shinagawa Station is an 8-minute walk and Tokyo Station is a 20-minute train ride away. Tokyo Tower is a 25 minute train ride away, while Ebisu Garden Place is a 30-minute bus ride away from the hotel. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and fridge. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom including free toiletries, toothbrushes and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Miyako City Tokyo Takanawa featuring panini and a selection of hot meals, salads and drinks. Miyako City Tokyo Takanawa can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Guests can find a coin launderette or use laundry service at the front desk, while a drinks vending machine is fitted on site. Maxell Aqua Park is situated a 10-minute walk away. On trains, Haneda Airport is 20 minutes away, while Narita International Airport is 75 minutes from Miyako City Tokyo Takanawa.

name: Apa Hotel Ningyocho Ekihigashi
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 119 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Property Location Located in Tokyo (Chuo), APA Hotel Ningyocho Ekihigashi is within a 10-minute walk of Meijiza Theater and Koami Shrine. This hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Suitengu Shrine and 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Tokyo International Forum. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: The city tax ranges from JPY 100-200 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 10,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: nine hours woman Shinjuku
description: Well situated in the centre of Tokyo, nine hours woman Shinjuku offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Full Gospel Tokyo Church, Flags Shopping Mall, and Takatsukisan Chozenji Temple. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from Taiso-ji Temple. The shared bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the capsule hotel every room includes bed linen and towels. Staff speak English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near nine hours woman Shinjuku include Tenryu-ji Temple, Nakamuraya Salon Museum of Art and NEWoMan Mall. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Jr-East Hotel Mets Mejiro
description: JR-EAST HOTEL METS MEJIRO is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tokyo, whether exploring or just passing through. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, laundromat, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature Non-smoking. The property offers various recreational opportunities. JR-EAST HOTEL METS MEJIRO combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tokyo unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Roppongi-Eki-Higashi
description: Near Tokyo Tower With a stay at Apa Hotel＆Resort〈Roppongi Ekihigashi〉 in Tokyo (Roppongi), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Imperial Palace. This hotel is 4.3 mi (6.9 km) from Tokyo Dome and 6.2 mi (9.9 km) from Tokyo Skytree. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Suntory Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Roppongi Hills - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Tokyo Tower - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Tokyo Midtown - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Shiba Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Keio University - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi Hibiya Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi Happoen Garden - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi Meiji Jingu Stadium - 3 km / 1.8 mi Tokyo Takarazuka Theatre - 3 km / 1.9 mi Tokyo Imperial Palace - 3 km / 1.9 mi Omotesando Hills - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Tokyo Midtown Hibiya - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Ginza Six - 3.3 km / 2 mi Imperial Garden Theatre - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi The nearest airports are: Haneda Airport (HND) - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi Narita Intl. Airport (NRT) - 70 km / 43.5 mi Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Make yourself at home in one of the 696 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary bottled water.Ticket Package

name: Shinjuku Prince Hotel
description: Right next to the lively Kabukicho area, Shinjuku Prince Hotel is a 5-minute walk from JR Shinjuku Station. It features massage services and a Japanese restaurant with panoramic city views. Fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, rooms at Shinjuku Prince Hotel have an elegant contemporary design. Each includes a fridge and a safe. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and slippers. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Isetan Department Store and a 10-minute drive from Shinjuku Gyoen Garden. Nearby Shinjuku Station offers direct train access to the Shibuya and Harajuku areas within 5 minutes. The hotel is directly above Seibu-Shinjuku Train Station. Internet stations can be used for a fee, and luggage storage is available at the bell desk. The 24-hour front desk is offered. A variety of shops are located directly below the hotel. Restaurant Fuga-Wafu on the 25th floor features creative Japanese cooking and a bar, while Prince Marche serves buffet meals with Western and Japanese foods.

name: Apa Hotel Kanda-Eki-Higashi
description: APA Hotel Kanda-Eki Higashi is a 7-minute walk from JR Kanda Train Station's East Exit. It offers massages, an on-site restaurant and free in-room WiFi. The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV 32-inch or larger. Guests at APA Hotel Kanda-Eki Higashi can try on a Yukata robe and relax in air-conditioned comfort on an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Rooms have a fridge, a video-on-demand system and an electric kettle with green tea. Slippers are provided in the private bathroom, which has a bathtub with shower attachment. There is a coin launderette on site. The in-house restaurant WHIZ CAFE is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Akihabara electronics area and the famous Mitsukoshi department store. Nearby Kanda Station is on the Yamanote Line, offering direct train access to Tokyo, Asakusa, Shinjuku, Ginza, Ueno, Shibuya and other major areas.

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Roppongi Tokyo Premier
description: Set in Tokyo, within 400 metres of Sony Music Roppongi Museum and 500 metres of Asahi Shrine, Mitsui Garden Hotel Roppongi Tokyo Premier provides free WiFi throughout the property. The property is located 1.1 km from Mori Art Museum, 1.1 km from Juban Inari Shrine and 1.3 km from The Former Residence of Naoya Shiga. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Sen-oku Hakukokan Museum, Izumo Shrine Tokyo Bunshi and Roppongi Hills. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 22 km from Mitsui Garden Hotel Roppongi Tokyo.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata Higashi-guchi
description: The 2.5-star Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata Higashi-guchi offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Tokyo. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, newspapers are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Tokyo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata Higashi-guchi.Agoda

name: Gate Stay Premium Nihonbashi
description: GATE STAY Premium Nihonbashi has air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Tokyo, 300 m from Daiichi Sankyo Kusuri Museum, 300 m from Coredo Muromachi 2 and 400 m from Ryoshainari Shrine. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and toaster are also featured, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Yuito Nihonbashi, Fukutoku Shrine and Yakuso Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 27 km from GATE STAY Premium Nihonbashi.WebBeds

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo Kiba
description: APA Hotel Tokyo Kiba provides well-equipped rooms with a bathtub and yukata (casual summer kimono), a 5-minute walk from Kiba Station. It features a restaurant, massage services and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Tokyo Kiba APA Hotel is a 11 minutes from Tokyo Big Sight. The Nihombashi area can be accessed via a 6-minute subway ride, while the Tsukiji Fish Market and the upscale Ginza area are a 15-minute taxi ride away. The rooms are modern and feature an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, heating and air conditioning facilities, as well as, a fridge. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. A Video on Demand (VOD) system is also available. A Japanese and Western-style Gozen-style breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant, Public Bar Clover. There are vending machines on site.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa-eki Takanawa-guchi
description: Attractively located in the centre of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa-eki Takanawa-guchi features buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Museum of Logistics is 700 metres away and Monument of Iwaya Sazanami Residence is 800 metres from the hotel. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa-eki Takanawa-guchi are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide advice at the reception. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa-eki Takanawa-guchi include Zakurozaka, Takanawa-Minamimachi Park and Nihondo Kampo Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Haneda Inn
description: Haneda Inn is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tokyo, whether exploring or just passing through. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Haneda Inn. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find complimentary tea, towels, clothes rack, slippers, flat screen television. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Haneda Inn is an excellent choice from which to explore Tokyo or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Commun Shibuya (male Only)
description: Commun SHIBUYA (Male Only) is a male only accommodation situated in the Shibuya Ward district in Tokyo, 500 metres from Hachiko Statue. Every room at this capsule hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a TV. Every room is fitted with a shared bathroom. Commun SHIBUYA (Male Only) features free WiFi. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Shibuya Center Town is 500 metres from commun SHIBUYA (Male Only), while NHK Studio Park is 1.1 km from the property. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is 13 km away.

name: Apa Hotel Nihonbashi-Hamachoeki-Minami
description: Just 500 metres from Hamacho Subway Station, APA Hotel Nihombashi Hamacho-eki Minami provides free WiFi in all areas and modern rooms with free wired internet, an LCD TV and a private bath. Accha Restaurant serves breakfast and lunch as a set meal, for a fee. Rooms at Nihombashi Hamacho-eki Minami APA Hotel are compact and air-conditioned, with a fridge and green tea. An original mattress optimising weight distribution is provided in all rooms. A Yukata robe and toiletries are provided. Some rooms have Sumida River views. Kokugikan Sumo Stadium is 1.5 km from the hotel. Suitengumae Subway Station is a 10-minute walk and offers direct access to the Otemachi and Shibuya areas. Tokyo Station is 4.5 km away. Massages can be requested at the 24-hour front desk. A free-use microwave and coin-operated launderette are on site. The breakfast is available from 07:00-10:00.

name: Citadines Shinjuku Tokyo
description: Set in Central Tokyo, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Tokyo Korean Culture Center. It also received TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award - Top 25 Hotel in Japan 2013. This 3-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. A fitness centre can be readily accessed by those wanting to keep active while away. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. They each include a seating area, a private bathroom and slippers. Citadines Shinjuku Tokyo is close to Shinjuku-sanchome Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Foodies will find many restaurants close by.Revato

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Hamacho Meijiza Mae
description: Well located in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Hamacho Meijiza Mae is located 300 metres from Revival Monument of Japanese Traditional Chinese Medicine, 400 metres from Hamacho Park and 500 metres from Genyadana Monument. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is close to popular attractions like Hatsunemori Shrine, Horidome Children's Park and Ekoin Temple. At the hotel, each room has a desk. Guest rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Hamacho Meijiza Mae are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Staff at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Hamacho Meijiza Mae are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street, Sankatsu Yukata Museum and Suginomori Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Hamacho Meijiza Mae.

name: Hilton Tokyo
description: Experience the vibrancy of modern Japan when you stay in the heart of Tokyo’s dynamic business, shopping and entertainment center at the Hilton Tokyo. This luxury hotel in Shinjuku offers contemporary guest rooms, an exclusive Executive Lounge, selection of restaurants and bars and 24/7 fitness center and business center. Restaurants and Bars TSUNOHAZU dinning floor - Junisoh, Dynasty, Metropolitan Grill, Zatta, and Marble Lounge, St. George Bar. Internet: WiFi available at Lobby and Marble Lounge area. Wired & Wireless HSIA for up to five devices in all guest rooms Fitness: Produced by PRECOCR / Free for in house guests / 24/7 gym available. Indoor pool, sauna and whirlpool available.Hilton

name: Mustard Hotel Asakusa 1
description: In a prime location in Tokyo, Hotel Plus Hostel Tokyo Asakusa 1 provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 500 metres from Drum Museum, 500 metres from Hozomon Gate and 600 metres from Nitenmon Gate. The hostel features a sauna and luggage storage space. All units include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Asakusa Station, Komagatado and Asakusa Public Hall. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from Hotel Plus Hostel Tokyo Asakusa 1.

name: The Tokyo Edition, Toranomon
description: Experience the unparalleled comfort of the luxury lifestyle at The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon. With a downtown location offering a privileged view of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Bay, our luxury hotel signals a new generation in laid-back luxury. Discover an unprecedented intersection of tasteful design, innovation and elevated service steps from the city’s renowned art galleries, cultural landmarks, nightlife and restaurants. Showcasing premier dining, entertainment and amenities under one roof, our enchanting hotel offers an oasis of sophistication in downtown Tokyo, Japan. Every amenity achieves the perfect balance of comfort and style, from a specialty restaurant and signature cocktail bar to a 24-hour gym and custom-designed spa with 6 treatment rooms. The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon features 206 hotel rooms and suites with iconic skyline views, including 15 rooms with outdoor terraces.Marriott

name: Hotel Metropolitan Edmont Tokyo
description: Located in the heart of Tokyo just a 5-minute walk from the East Exit of JR Iidabashi Subway Station, Hotel Metropolitan Edmont Tokyo offers comfortable rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The hotel boasts 6 dining options and massages. Guests stay at either the Main Building or East Wing Building. Nearby Iidabashi Station has 5 subway/train lines and offers direct access to the Shinjuku and Otemachi areas as well as the Kokugikan Sumo Stadium at Ryogoku. Guest rooms at the Tokyo Metropolitan Edmont are decorated with wood highlights, giving a warm feel to the room. They are air-conditioned and fitted with a fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub with shower attachment. The hotel features a convenience store and a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage and currency exchange. Metropolitan Edmont Hotel offers a variety of fine dining, including Western cuisine and local specialities such as sushi and Japanese teppanyaki grill dishes. Restaurant Beltempo serves a daily breakfast buffet for a fee.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Jiyugaoka
description: Rooms Stay in one of 30 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Property Location Located in Tokyo (Meguro), Hotel Pulitzer Jiyugaoka is a 5-minute walk from La Vita, Jiyugaoka and 5 minutes by foot from Jiyugaoka Kumano-jinja Shrine. This hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Kuhombutsu Joshinji and 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Tokyo Institute of Technology. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: The city tax ranges from JPY 100-200 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 10,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability, amount varies) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability, amount varies) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) available Unicode Support true Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Property follows sanitization practices of Intertek Cristal (3rd party expert - Global)Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Shangri-La Tokyo
address: Chiyoda-ku, Marunouchi Trust Tower Main, 1-8-3 Marunouchi, Tokyo 100-8283
description: This modern hotel is in Central Tokyo, a short stroll to Nihonbashi. It provides an indoor pool, a sauna and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site day spa, CHI. For a fast and effortless arrival and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. It also offers useful options for business meetings and events. Rooms feature tea and coffee making facilities, movies-on-demand and a pillow menu. All offer a Blu-ray player, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Those staying at Shangri-La Tokyo can indulge in a beverage at Lobby Lounge, before savouring a meal at Nadaman. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Shangri-La Tokyo is close to Tokyo's well-known attractions, with Mitsukoshi, INCJ and Bank of Japan just a 10-minute stroll away. Guests can also visit Marunouchi and Tokyo Stock Exchange.Revato

name: Hotel Gajoen Tokyo
description: Boasting chic decor with touches of Japanese traditional aethetics, Hotel Gajoen Tokyo is a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. 7 dining options are featured, and free parking is available on site. JR Meguro Station is 6 minutes on foot and Tokyo Metropolitan Teien Art Museum is a 12-minute stroll. Free WiFi is provided throughout. All spacious rooms rooms include a satellite TV with cable channels, minibar, a coffee machine and handy smartphone. An en suite bathroom is fitted with a spa bath, free toiletries and hairdryer. For your comfort, some rooms include a sauna. Guests can unwind in a Japanese-style garden or at a library on site The front desk is open for 24 hours a day, and there are a pastry shop and gift shop at the property. Massage services and room services can be arranged. Shunyuki serves signature Chinese delicacies, while Tofutei offers an authentic Japanese kaiseki multi-course meal. Teppanyaki Japanese wagyu beed, American-style grilled dishes and Italian cuisine can be sampled on site. Live piano performance can also be enjoyed at an on-site cafe lounge in the day time. JR Shibuya Station is a 5-minute train ride, while JR Shinagawa Station is 8 minutes by train from Hotel Gajoen Tokyo. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 10 km away.

name: Tokyu Stay Tsukiji
description: Located within a 5-minute walk from Higashi-Ginza and Tsukiji Subway Stations, Tokyu Stay Tukiji offers modern accommodation with free property-wide WiFi. It is situated right in the middle of Outer Tsukiji Fish Market, lined with many sushi restaurants and seafood vendors. Some rooms come with a kitchenette and a washing machine. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a small fridge and a electric kettle. A hairdryer and toiletries are included in the en suite bathroom. The front desk is open 24 hours, and the hotel has dry cleaning services. Fax, photocopying and courier services are also offered. Luggage can be stored at the property for free. Tokyu Stay Tukiji is a 10-minute walk from the Ginza area and a 3-minute walk from the Inner Tsukiji Fish Market with bustling wholesalers. The nearby subway stations offer easy access to the Akihabara, Ueno and Asakusa areas.

name: Apa Villa Hotel Akasaka Mitsuke
description: Just a 2-minute walk from Akasaka-Mitsuke Subway Station, APA Villa Hotel Akasaka-Mitsuke provides simple modern rooms with an LCD TV, and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Bar Del Sole serves breakfast and lunch buffets. Rooms at Akasaka-Mitsuke APA Villa Hotel are compact and air-conditioned, with a fridge and green tea. Guests can enjoy video-on-demand movies for free, and a Yukata robe and toiletries are provided. An original mattress optimising weight distribution will be available in all rooms for guest's to sleep comfortably. Nearby Akasaka-Mitsuke Station has direct subway links to the Shinjuku, Shibuya, and Ginza areas as well as Tokyo Station. The Imperial Palace and Roppongi Hills are both about 2 km away. A free-use microwave is on site. The Japanese/Western breakfast buffet is available from 07:00-10:00. In the evenings, the wood-panelled bar serves cocktails.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Tokyo Station
description: Experience Tokyo, Japan like a local at Courtyard Tokyo Station. Centrally located in downtown Tokyo, our hotel is perfect for any business traveler seeking comfort, convenience and value. Only moments from our hotel, the JR lines and Tokyo Station bullet trains provide easy access to the city and beyond. Shop at the Ginza, which is an easy 10-minute walk from our hotel. Our lobby's comfortable seating and communal tables provide the ideal setting for impromptu work sessions. Hotel rooms include deluxe beds, flat-screen TVs, room service and well-lit desks. Contemporary meeting rooms set an impressive stage for seminars and shareholder events in Tokyo, Japan. Our outdoor seating area provides an enticing gathering spot for travelers and local office workers alike to indulge in light refreshments or specialties from our street-level restaurant and café. Find everything you need to move forward from our central hotel at Courtyard Tokyo Station.Marriott

name: Ebisuholic Hotel
description: Ideally set in the centre of Tokyo, Ebisuholic Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and free WiFi. Boasting a sun terrace, this property is situated a short distance from America Bashi Park, Tokyo Metropolitan Museum of Photography and Atre Ebisu Shopping Mall. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Statue of The God Ebisu. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At Ebisuholic Hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. Speaking English and Japanese, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ebisu East Park, Log Road Daikanyama Shopping Street and Daikanyama Address Dixsept. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 15 km from Ebisuholic Hotel.

name: The Okura Tokyo
description: Composed of 2 buildings, The Okura Tokyo boasts a garden and bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The accommodation features a concierge, ticket service and currency exchange for guests. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, kettle and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms have a private bathroom with a bath, hairdryer, bidet and free toiletries. Located on 28-40 floors, Prestige Tower offers rooms with cityscape views. Guests booking room type with Club Lounge Access in Heritage Wing can enjoy Club Lounge. Spacious rooms in Heritage Wing include complimentary welcome drink, steam sauna and spa bath. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near The Okura Tokyo include Iino Hall and Conference Centre, National Diet Building and Space FS Shiodome. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International, 22 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Skm Tokyo Hotel & Dining
description: Located in Tokyo, 300 metres from Sachio Ito Residence Monument, THE skM TOKYO HOTEL & DINING provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is close to Kokusan Match Hassho no Chi Monument, Oiteke Horiato Monument and Arcakit Kinshicho Shopping Mall. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At THE skM TOKYO HOTEL & DINING each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near THE skM TOKYO HOTEL & DINING include Koto-ji Temple, Tanishiinari Shrine and Kinshi Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Sunroute Plaza Shinjuku
description: Located in central Shinjuku just a 4-minute walk from Shinsen-Shinjuku Station and JR Shinjuku Station, Hotel Sunroute Plaza features rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi. Drinks vending machines and a launderette are on site, while currency exchange is available. Shinjuku Gyoen Park, the Kabukicho area, Yoyogi Park and the famous Isetan Department Store are all less than a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Sunroute Plaza Shinjuku feature a simple yet sophisticated decor. Each includes a refrigerator, electric kettle and flat-screen TV. The Shinjuku Sunroute Plaza offers luggage storage, dry cleaning services and safety deposit of valuables at the 24-hour front desk. An airport shuttle service is available at a fee. Trattoria Villazza serves a Western-style breakfast buffet and Italian cuisine for lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy a drink or light meal at the stylish Bar Ku Kon.

name: Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae
description: Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Tokyo Disney Resort district of Urayasu. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Former House of Udagawa Family. At the hotel, rooms have a balcony with a city view. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Former House of Otsuka Family is 700 metres from Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae, while Urayasu Local Museum is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Narita International Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo
description: Occupying the top nine floors of the 53-story Midtown Tower in the Roppongi District, the capital’s entertainment and design-related business hub, The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo features 245 elegantly appointed guest rooms. Our downtown Tokyo hotel features a Club Lounge and fine dining with views of the Shinjuku area, the Imperial Palace or Mount Fuji. Guests at our luxury hotel in Tokyo, Japan can enjoy an indoor pool, a soothing spa and a floor dedicated to health and wellness. Our business hotel in Tokyo also features reimagined meeting spaces with free Wi-Fi available throughout the property. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, a luxurious welcome awaits at The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo.Marriott

name: Moxy Tokyo Kinshicho
description: Located 6 minute walk from JR and Metro Kinshicho station, Moxy Tokyo Kinshicho is near all the major sights including Tokyo Skytree, the Imperial Palace, Asakusa Sensoji Temple and the Tokyo Dome, where baseball and concerts draw big names and big crowds. Our stylish and smart rooms feature everything you and your device need, with super-comfy beds, furiously fast free Wi-Fi and large flat-screen TVs. Our action-packed spaces provide uncompromising experiences like dancing in the Lounge, connecting to local culture in the library, sweating it out at the gym and working in the meeting room.Official Hotel Information

name: Section L Yushima
description: Attractively located in the Bunkyo district of Tokyo, Section L Yushima is situated 600 metres from Kamezumiinari Shrine, 600 metres from Shitamachi Museum and 600 metres from Kyu-Iwasaki-tei Garden. The property is around 600 metres from ‪Marishiten Tokudaiji‬ Temple, less than 1 km from Kanda Shrine Stone Lion Statue and a 9-minute walk from Miyamoto Park. The property is 4.8 km from the city centre and 200 metres from Ryuseido Shinjo-in Temple. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Section L Yushima also boast free WiFi. All rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Matsuzakaya Ueno, Yushima Goryo Shrine and Origami Kaikan. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Section L Yushima.

name: Shibuya Hotel En
description: Renovated in February 2016, Shibuya Hotel En offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features 2 dining options and massage services. The property is located just a 7-minute walk away from Shibuya Station. Rooms are air-conditioned and furnished with a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle and a seating area. A trouser press is available for the convenience of guests. Shibuya Hotel En has a 24-hour front desk with complimentary luggage storage. Laundry service is available. Shibuya Hotel En is situated amidst shops and restaurants, while Shibuya Station offers many public transport connections. It is a 5-minute walk to the 109 Building and Shibuya Scramble Crossing, and a 15-minute walk to Yoyogi Park.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza-Sanchome
description: Attractively situated in Tokyo, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza Sanchome features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from Asahi Inari Shrine. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Rooms include a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza Sanchome every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV.
