The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Speaking English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near Sotetsu Fresa Inn Ginza Sanchome include Wakayama Art Museum, Antique Mall Ginza and Pola Museum Annex. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Wing International Ikebukuro
description: An 8-minute walk from JR Ikebukuro Train Station, Hotel Wing International offers rooms with free broadband internet and a private bathroom. A shiatsu massage service is available. The rooms at Hotel Wing International Ikebukuro are furnished with a flat-screen satellite TV and a refrigerator. Guests can relax in the nightgown and slippers and enjoy a cup of tea. Ikebukuro Hotel Wing International is just a 3-minute walk from Sunshine City, where the Airport Limousine Bus stops. Nearby Ikebukuro station offers direct train access to Shinjuku and Shibuya.

name: Hotel Arcsens
description: Located in Tokyo, 200 metres from Yokoamicho Park, Arcsens Tokyo provides rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Built in 2019, this 3-star hotel is within 300 metres of NTT Docomo History Square and 200 metres of Kanto Earthquake Memorial Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Tokyo Metropolitan Memorial Hall. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Arcsens Tokyo include The Sumida Hokusai Museum, Japanese Sword Museum and Birthplace of Ukiyo-e Artist Hokusai Katsushika. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No.1
description: Well situated in the Taito district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No 1 is set 300 metres from World Bags and Luggage Museum, 500 metres from Komagatado and 500 metres from Asakusa Station. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The units in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No 1 are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No 1 include Kuramae Jinja Shrine, Honpo-ji Temple and Drum Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Toyoko Inn Omori
description: With a stay at Toyoko Inn Omori in Tokyo (Ota), you'll be a 4-minute drive from Tokyo Bay and 9 minutes from Tokyo Tower. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Tokyo, Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and free WiFi. The property is close to Wakaba Higashi Park, Sotobori Park and Oiwa Mizukake Kannon. Minamimotomachi Park is less than 1 km away and Fire Museum is a 9-minute walk from the hotel. At the hotel, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya the rooms have bed linen and towels. Buffet and Asian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Speaking English and Japanese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya include Shimmichi Shopping Street, Former Futabatei Shimei House Monument and Shinjuku Historical Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa
description: Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa offers spacious rooms with a balcony beside a 5-acre Japanese garden. A 5-minute walk from Shinagawa Shinkansen Station, it features several restaurants. The property features the Club Lounge, where guests with access can relax and enjoy light meals. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests at Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa stay in contemporary air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub and shower, and an electric kettle is provided. From nearby Shinagawa Station, Tokyo Station is a 12-minute train ride. The Shinjuku, Harajuku and Shibuya areas can all be reached within 20 minutes by train, while Tokyo Big Sight Convention Centre is 11 km away and the Roppongi area is 5.5 km away. In mid-summer, 2 outdoor pools are available for an extra charge. A concierge provides sightseeing assistance. There is also a business room on site. A buffet-style breakfast is served at SLOPE SIDE DINER ZAKURO Buffet&Café. Guests can enjoy Japanese cuisine at SHIMIZU Japanese Restaurant and SHUMEI Japanese-style Room. There is also a Chinese restaurant, chocolate salon and bar at the property.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho
description: Conveniently located in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho is set 100 metres from Koamicho Children's Park, 300 metres from Monument of Armor Tribute Site and 500 metres from Sankatsu Yukata Museum. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All guest rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho include Horidome Children's Park, Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street and Tokyo Shoken Building Inc. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Hotel Akihabara-Ekikita
description: Well situated in the Taito district of Tokyo, APA Hotel Akihabara Ekikita is set 400 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park, 300 metres from Convention Room AP Akihabara and 500 metres from Akihabara Park. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 4.9 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Fujisoft Akiba Plaza. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also have free WiFi. At APA Hotel Akihabara Ekikita all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Izumi Park, Akihabara Convention Hall and Kanaami Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from APA Hotel Akihabara Ekikita.

name: Hotel Livemax Asakusa Sky Front
description: Conveniently situated in the Sumida Ward district of Tokyo, HOTEL LiVEMAX Asakusa Sky Front is situated 400 metres from Tokyo Skytree, less than 1 km from Chiisanagarasunohonno Museum and a 12-minute walk from Kamejimashogakko Memorial Park. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Tobacco & Salt Museum. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a TV. Popular points of interest near HOTEL LiVEMAX Asakusa Sky Front include Sumida Riverside Hall, Ushijima Shrine and Ōyokokawa Shinsui Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Pullman Tokyo Tamachi
description: Business or pleasure, Pullman Tokyo Tamachi transcends you to an energizing playground in the heart of Tokyo. Furnished with artwork to spark your creativity, housed with the facilities for global nomads, and blessed with a vibrant restaurant, lounge and bars.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Metropolitan Tokyo Marunouchi
description: Hotel Metropolitan Tokyo Marunouchi is connected to Tokyo Station, a 1-minute walk from Otemachi Station along the Tokyo Metro Tozai Line. This stylish 4-star hotel features a restaurant, a 24-hour business centre and free WiFi in rooms. Air-conditioned guestrooms feature a modern interior. Each room is well-equipped with a fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy massage services upon request. Laundry services are offered. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Located on the 27th floor, TENQOO restaurant and bar features views of the vibrant Tokyo city. It serves a variety of French and Japanese dishes. Located in Sapia Tower, the Metropolitan Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. The electronics and anime culture of Akihabara are 2 train stops away on the Yamanote Line, while Tsukiji Fish Market is a 15-minute taxi ride. Haneda Airport is located 15 km away.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai
description: Attractively located in the Edogawa district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai is situated 1.1 km from Shin Nagashima River Shinsui Park, 1.1 km from Gyosen Park and 1.2 km from Subway Museum. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ukita Park, Furukawa Shinsui Park and Shinsakon River Shinsui Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai.

name: The Strings By Intercontinental, Tokyo, An IHG Hotel
description: Refined and elegant as the city itself, The Strings by InterContinental Tokyo is the perfect way to experience the beauty of Tokyo. The hotel is only a short walk from Shinagawa Station, with direct access via the Shinkansen Bullet Train to Yokohama, Osaka, Kyoto and Kobe. The famous Tsukiji Fish Market and Ginza district are nearby; Haneda International Airport is 15 min away from our hotel in Tokyo by Airport Express Train, whilst Narita International Airport is 1 hour by limousine bus.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Trunk(Hotel) Yoyogi Park
description: No description found

name: Section L Hatchobori
description: Along with laundry facilities, this smoke-free aparthotel has a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi in public areas. Each apartment provides a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, plus a kitchen with a refrigerator, a stovetop, and a microwave. Guests can appreciate conveniences like a washer/dryer and a dining area, and other amenities include free WiFi and a rice cooker. Housekeeping is available on request.Expedia

name: Dormy Inn Premium Shibuya Jingumae Hot Spring
description: A 5-minute walk from Meiji Jingumae Subway Station, the completely non-smoking Dormy Inn Premium Shibuya-jingumae features modern accommodations with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with shampoo, conditioner and a hairdryer. Shibuya-jingumae Premium Dormy Inn is a 10-minute walk from Yoyogi Park and Takeshita Street. Shibuya Station and JR Harajuku Train Station are both a 10-minute walk. A spacious public bath is available for guests to relax in. A coin-operated launderette and drink vending machines are available on-site as well. Guests can rent a humidifier or DVD player to use in their rooms. A Japanese/Western breakfast is available at Hatago. Free Yonaki Soba ramen noodles are catered at night.

name: Bay Hotel Tokyo Hamamatsucho
description: No description found

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Gotanda Tokyo
description: Open from June 2018 and located in the Shinagawa district of Tokyo, Mitsui Garden Hotel Gotanda is 2.2 km from Ebisu Garden Place and 3.9 km from Roppongi Hills. This 4-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is 3.9 km from Mori Art Museum and 4.1 km from Tokyo Tower. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath. At Mitsui Garden Hotel Gotanda every room is fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves a variety of Italian dishes. Round-the-clock assistance is available at the reception. Nezu Museum is 4.2 km from the accommodation, while Hachiko Statue is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 9 km from Mitsui Garden Hotel Gotanda.

name: Apa Hotel Shimbashi Toranomon
description: Located just a 6-minute walk from JR Shinbashi Train Station, APA Hotel Shinbashi Toranomon offers free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour front desk. Air conditioned rooms have carpeted floors and are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels. Each room features an original mattress optimising weight distribution and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each comes with an electric kettle, a green tea set and a refrigerator. At Shinbashi Toranomon APA Hotel, guests can get a massage at a surcharge. A luggage storage service and vending machines are also available on site. An Italian restaurant Su E Giu is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute walk and train ride away, while the popular Ginza shopping area is accessible within a 15-minute walk from the property. Tokyo Tower is a 7-minute taxi ride from the hotel.

name: Century Southern Tower Hotel
description: Offering a restaurant, Odakyu Hotel Century Southern Tower is located in Tokyo. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a bath, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and bed linen. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and a vending machine. The hotel is 900 metres from Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, 1.3 km from Meiji Jingu Shrine and 1.8 km from Harajuku Station. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hotel Groove Shinjuku, A Parkroyal Hotel
description: The establishment features a total of 538 units. The hotel offers Wi-Fi internet connection on-site. Those who stay at this establishment are welcomed in a lobby with 24-hour reception. Communal areas are wheelchair accessible at Hotel Groove Shinjuku, A Parkroyal Hotel. The hotel may charge a fee for some services.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Monday Tokyo Nishikasai
description: Situated just a 1-minute walk from Nishi-Kasai Station, within 4.3 miles from Tokyo Disney Resort and 5.6 miles from Tokyo Skytree and Ryogoku Kokugikan National Sumo Stadium, hotel MONday Tokyo Nishikasai is set in Tokyo and offers free shuttle service to Tokyo Disney Resort. The hotel also provides rooms with free WiFi. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. Tokyo Gate Bridge is 18 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 26 km from hotel MONday Tokyo Nishikasai.

name: Section L Tsukiji
description: No description found

name: Shinjuku Washington Hotel Main
description: Connected to Shinjuku Station, Shinjuku Washington Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the fashionable shopping and dining district of Shinjuku. It features a lounge with massage chairs, and it offers concierge service and free WiFi. Shinjuku JR Train Station, the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Buildings and Shinjuku Gyoen Park are about a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The famous Kabukicho entertainment area is a 10-minute walk away. Compact rooms at Hotel Shinjuku Washington are equipped with a refrigerator and hairdryer. Guests can enjoy watching pay-per-view movies on the flat-screen TV. Shinjuku Washington offers coin-operated internet-PCs at the lobby. A 24-hour convenience store is located on the first floor. Manhattan Table offers views of Shinjuku's skyline and serves a variety of grilled dishes. Fujita features grilled Japanese specialities. Shinjuku Washington Hotel also has a coffee shop and bar.

name: Fav Tokyo Nishinippori
description: Conveniently located in the Arakawa district of Tokyo, FAV TOKYO Nishinippori is situated 1.3 km from Nippori South Park, less than 1 km from Kyoouji Temple and a 11-minute walk from The Site of Koda Rohan House. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Fabre Insect Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At FAV TOKYO Nishinippori all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near FAV TOKYO Nishinippori include Asakura Museum of Sculpture, Shinkomutsumi Shopping Street and TABATA Memorial Museum of Writers and Artists. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Asia Center of Japan
description: Just 500 metres from Aoyama-Itchome Subway Station, Hotel Asia Center features a Western restaurant and a massage service. Guest rooms have a LAN cable, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Asia Center of Japan have a wooden desk. Rooms also come with tea bags of Japanese green tea and houjicha, or oven-roasted tea. A flat-screen TV with satellite and VOD channels is also available. The bathroom is equipped with a bathtub. Nogizaka Subway Station is 500 metres from the hotel, and the Midtown Complex is less than a 10-minute walk away. The National Art Centre is 900 metres away. Nearby Aoyama-Itchome Station offers direct access to the Shibuya, Ginza and Shinjuku areas. Coin-operated internet stations and laundry machines are provided. The 24-hour reception offers luggage storage, and free mineral water is available at the lobby. Onsite restaurant SHIKI offers Japanese and Western style cuisine. Guests can enjoy drink include cocktail and sake.

name: Tokyo Stay Hut Sari
description: No description found

name: The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic
description: Open from December 2018, an 11-minute walk from Marunouchi Building, The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic is set in Tokyo and has a fitness centre and free WiFi. The property is located a 16-minute walk from Tsukiji Fish Market and 1.5 km from Japan Imperial Palace. The property is situated an 18-minute walk from National Diet Building and a 20-minute walk from Kachidoki Bridge. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A set menu of breakfast is served daily at the property. The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic offers a terrace. Speaking English and Japanese at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hotel Metropolitan Tokyo Ikebukuro
description: Hotel Metropolitan Tokyo Ikebukuro is located in central Tokyo next to Ikebukuro Train Station, offering easy transport links. The hotel features a spa, 6 restaurants and free in-room wired internet. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Metropolitan Ikebukuro feature panoramic city views. Each room includes tea-making facilities and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Guests can relax in the spa bath, swim in the 2-lane indoor pool or work out at the fitness centre (all with minimum age limit and surcharge). The hotel also features an aesthetic salon. Dining options at the hotel include Japanese, Chinese and European cuisines. The 25th-floor Est Italian Restaurant and Ovest Bar offer spectacular city views. Cross Dine Restaurant serves an international buffet spread. Ikebukuro Station offers 5 train lines and 3 subway lines, including direct access to the Shinjuku, Harajuku and Shibuya areas. Airport buses to Haneda and Narita Airport come directly to Metropolitan Hotel.(The limousine bus may be suspended due to the coronavirus (COVID-19).)

name: Mr Kintaro Hotel Asakusa South
description: Located in Tokyo, this welcoming apartment brings it all within your reach. Your feet will make short work of the 8-minute walk to Kitchen Town or the 15-minute walk to Ameyoko Shopping District. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Tokyo by hopping on a metro at either Shin-okachimachi Station, a short 7-minute walk away, or Kuramae Station (Oedo), 7 minutes away. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop and a refrigerator. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the flat-screen TV. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Roppongi Hotel S
description: Situated in the Roppongi area and a 7-minute walk from Roppongi Subway Station, Roppongi Hotel S boasts accommodation with five on-site restaurants offer various dishes. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, a microwave and a fridge. A bath tub and toiletries are provided in the ensuite bathroom. Roppongi Hills complex is a 5-minute walk away, while Tokyo Midtown and National Art Centre are both an 8-minute walk from S Hotel Roppongi. The Shibuya area is just a 10-minute drive away. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk offers concierge and free luggage storage services. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the area, or relax in the lounge. The restaurant offers Italian cuisine using fresh vegetables.

name: Hotel Tomos Asakusa
description: Conveniently set in Tokyo, HOTEL TOMOS ASAKUSA provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 600 metres from Sumida Cultural Museum, 400 metres from Honryuji Temple and 400 metres from Sanyabori Park. The property is non-smoking and is located 100 metres from Great Tokyo Air Raid Memorial Monument. At the hotel, rooms include a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At HOTEL TOMOS ASAKUSA, each room has a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Japanese and Chinese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Honryuin Matsuchiyama Shoden, Ushijima Shrine and Nitenmon Gate. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from HOTEL TOMOS ASAKUSA.

name: Business Hotel La Firenze
description: Situated in Tokyo, 600 metres from Sezaki Sengen Shrine, Business Hotel La Firenze features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi and a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries are accessible to all guests, while certain rooms have a Blu-ray player. The rooms at Business Hotel La Firenze have air conditioning and a desk. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Business Hotel La Firenze will be able to enjoy activities in and around Tokyo, like cycling. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Hanahata Park, Aigumi Park and Motofuchie Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 33 km from Business Hotel La Firenze.

name: Tokyo Green Palace
description: Tokyo Green Palace is located 200 metres from Kojimachi Subway Station and a 10-minute walk from the popular Imperial Palace. It offers a restaurant, massage services and rooms with free wired internet. Modern guest rooms feature bold colours and wood accents. Each room is equipped with an air purifier/humidifier, a cooling box and a flat-screen TV. Air conditioning and heating facilities are fitted in rooms. Laundry services are offered on site. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Jardin Restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet featuring Japanese and Western foods. It offers Japanese and Italian dishes for lunch and dinner. Palace Tokyo Green is a 10-minute walk from the Yasukuni Shrine. Yotsuya Station and Ichigaya Station are both 750 metres away.

name: Smile Hotel Asakusa
description: Offering rooms with free wired internet, a private bathroom and a flat-screen satellite TV, Smile Hotel is 900 metres from Asakusa Subway Station. It features a massage service and a breakfast buffet. The compact air-conditioned rooms at Smile Hotel Asakusa come with a tea maker, fridge and slippers. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and amenities. Kaminarimon Thunder Gate, Nakamise-dori Street and Asakusa-dera Temple are all 1 km away. The Sumida River ferry pier is about a 15-minute walk. Asakusa Station has direct subway links to Ueno and Ginza. Coin-operated laundry machines are on site, and the 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage.

name: Hyatt House Tokyo Shibuya
description: No description found

name: Dai-ichi Hotel Tokyo
description: Located just a 5-minute walk from the popular Ginza area, Daiichi Hotel Tokyo offers spacious modern rooms with free WiFi. Guests can request for relaxing massages after a workout at the fitness centre or a swim at the indoor pool. It also boast 10 dining options with various cuisines. JR Shimbashi Station is only a 2-minute walk away, and the Imperial Palace can be reached within a 20-minute walk. The Odaiba area is a 20-minute train ride away. Famous Tsukiji Fish Market is 7 minutes away by car or taxi. Direct airport limousine buses to/from both Narita and Haneda airports are available from the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms have warm lighting and carpeted floors. Each includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and an electric kettle with green tea bags. All rooms feature a Simmons mattress and memory foam pillows to ensure a good night's rest. Bathrobes are provided for all guests and the en suite bathroom has a shower. Guests can purchase small gifts at the souvenir shop or relax in the sauna rooms. Laundry services and daily newspapers are available at the front desk. Room service is offered 24/7.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Tokyo-Kanda
description: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Tokyo Kanda is offering accommodation in Tokyo. The property is located an 18-minute walk from Marunouchi Building. Free WiFi is available. At the economy hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Staff at the reception can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Edo Tokyo Museum is 2 km from Sotetsu Fresa Inn Tokyo Kanda, while Japan Imperial Palace is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Ichiyu Hotel Asakusa
description: No description found

name: Hotel Livemax Higashi Ginza
description: Open from December 2015, HOTEL LiVEMAX 東銀座 is situated just a 3-minute walk from Tsukiji Subway Station and a 6-minute walk from the Kabukiza Theater. Guests can enjoy VOD in their rooms or relax with a massage treatment at an additional fee. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Air-conditioned rooms come with comfortable beds, fridge, microwave, electric kettle and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom is equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Free luggage storage is available at Higashi Ginza Livemax. Phone charger rentals and coin-operated laundry machines are also available. Higashi Ginza Subway Station is a 7-minute walk away while JR Tokyo Station can be reached with a 15-minute ride on the Marunouchi Line. Visit Tsukiji Fish Market to savour fresh seafood or the popular shopping district Ginza, both located within a 10-minute stroll. Haneda Airport is a 41-minute train ride away. Various international cuisine options are available within a walking distance.

name: Mimaru Suites Tokyo Nihombashi
description: Set in the Chuo Ward district in Tokyo, MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 400 metres from Revival Monument of Japanese Traditional Chinese Medicine, 700 metres from Koamicho Children's Park and 700 metres from Takarada Ebisu Shrine. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Genyadana Monument. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI all rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sankatsu Yukata Museum, Suginomori Shrine and Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI.

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo-Kudanshita
description: A 3-minute walk from Exit 7 of Kudanshita Station and 1 km from Tokyo Dome, APA Hotel Tokyo Kudanshita features free WiFi. Massage services are available and modern rooms include an LCD TV. Offering rooms with a comfortable decor of neutral colours, Tokyo Kudanshita APA Hotel equips each with an electric kettle and a fridge. All rooms offer an original mattress optimising weight distribution, air-conditioning and come with toiletries and a wood desk. Video-on-demand movies can be used for free. Guests can store luggage at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Yasukuni Shrine and a 20-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. Kudanshita Station has direct links to the Shinjuku and Shibuya areas.

name: Hotel Mystays Ueno East
description: Located just a 2-minute walk from Inaricho Station offering direct access to Ginza and Shibuya and an 8-minute walk from Asakusa exit of Ueno Train Station, Hotel Mystays Ueno East offers massage services and a casual Western restaurant. Rooms feature a satellite TV and private bathroom with a bathtub. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room at Mystays Ueno East comes with a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view features, a fridge and electric kettle. Sleepwear and slippers are provided, while memory foam pillows ensure a good night's rest. Guests can make use of an air purifier and trouser press in the room. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer, toothbrushes and free amenities. Ueno Park is about a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while Tokyo National Museum is 15 minute on foot. Kaminarimon Thunder Gate and the Asakusa area are 1.5 km away. Laptops can be rented at the 24-hour front desk, which also offers luggage storage. You will find a drinks vending machine on site. The in-room massage service is available to guests for a charge.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport
description: Featuring a fitness centre, bar and views of river, Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport is set in Tokyo and connected to Haneda Airport International Passenger Terminal. Among the facilities of this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Every room includes a separate shower booth and views of the river. Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airpo offers a buffet or American breakfast. The accommodation offers an open-air hot spring bath, stone spa, sauna for guests to relax, while 30 restaurants are available onsite along with 60 shopping and shops. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the accommodation.

name: Oakwood Premier Tokyo
description: Oakwood Premier Tokyo is a luxury serviced apartment with hotel-like services, located at just a 2-minute walk from JR Tokyo Station’s Yaesu North Exit. Located on the 6-19th floors of a 19-storey building, this property is designed to offer a getaway in the centre of Tokyo. There is a 24-hour front desk on site. All apartments are fully furnished and include a fully-equipped kitchen that has a refrigerator, microwave, oven, coffee machine and electric kettle. Kitchenware is also included. There is a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels in addition to a DVD player in the apartments. A washing machine and dryer are also provided for guests' convenience. Private bathrooms include a bathrobe, hairdryer and free toiletries. There is a fitness centre, residence lounge and meeting space at the property. The on-site concierge service offers restaurant and taxi reservation services in addition to photo copy and fax business services. Dry cleaning, ironing and laundry services are provided for an additional fee. There is a parking garage at this property. There are many restaurants, cafes and dining options within a 5-minute walking distance from Oakwood Premier Tokyo. There are convenience stores within a 3-minute walk from the property. Tokyo International Forum is a 12-minute walk while the popular Ginza shopping district is a 18-minute walk away from Tokyo Oakwood Premier. Both the Imperial Palace Gardens and Tsukiji Market are 21-minutes by train from Oakwood Premier Tokyo. Guests can access Haneda Airport and Narita International Airport by taking the Airport Limousine from the ground floor for 30-minutes and 60-minutes, respectively.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1
description: In a prime location in the Ota Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 is located 3.1 km from Omori Hachiman Shrine, 3.4 km from Miwa Itsukushima Shrine and 3.5 km from Uramori Inari Shrine. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Gonsho-ji Temple is 3.9 km away and Morigasaki Kotsu Park is 4.1 km from the hotel. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Staff at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. Showa no Kurashi Museum is 3.6 km from the hotel, while Tokujo-ji Temple is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 5 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1.

name: Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku
description: Offering modern rooms with an in-room washer/dryer, microwave and a small fridge, Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku is a 2-minute walk from Nishi-Shinjuku Gochome Subway Station. Some rooms feature a kitchenette, while free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. The air-conditioned rooms at Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and an electric kettle. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Shinjuku Central Park and a 15-minute stroll from JR Shinjuku Train Station. The Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building is a 10-minute walk away. The nearby subway station offers direct access to Shinjuku and Roppongi. Nishi Shinjuku Tokyu Stay offers luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk. Dry cleaning, photocopying and couriers services are available for an extra fee. Breakfast is served in your room. Please choose from Japanese or Western breakfast.

name: Akihabara Washington Hotel
description: Conveniently located a 1-minute walk from JR Akihabara station and a 9-minute drive from Tokyo Station, Akihabara Washington Hotel offers modern accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Air-conditioned guestrooms are fitted with a refrigerator, a work desk and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a bathtub. Services offered by the 24-hour front desk includes luggage storage, currency exchange and safety deposit facilities. Laundry services is available. Hotel Washington Akihabara is a 25-minute drive from Tokyo Disneyland. Haneda Airport is 19 km away.

name: Hotel Mystays Premier Omori
description: A 5-minute walk from the north exit of JR Omori Train Station, HOTEL MYSTAYS PREMIER Omori offers classically furnished western rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms are decorated in earth tones and are equipped with a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a personal refrigerator and tea-making facilities. Rooms also come with a small sofa and a private bathroom with bath, shower and free toiletries. Guests can make arrangements for an in-room Swedish oil massage and laundry services are available. Discount passes to Shinagawa Aquarium, which is a 5-minute walk away can be purchased at Omori MYSTAYS PREMIER HOTEL. Private parking is available on site for an additional fee. It is a 20-minute drive to Odaiba and a 6-minute train ride to Shinagawa. Both Ueno in Tokyo and Yokohama can be reached within a 20-minute train ride from the Omori Station. Please note, guest room temperatures are centrally controlled. Guests cannot switch between air conditioning and heating.

name: ibis Styles Tokyo Ginza
description: Ibis Styles Tokyo Ginza is conveniently located in Tokyo's Shopping haven, Ginza. The finest attractions of Ginza are within walking distance from the hotel including Ginza Dori, Kabuki Theatre and the Imperial Palace. Ginza subway station, nearest to the hotel, provides access to all must-see destinations in Tokyo. The hotel's proximity to the Tokyo International Forum, and other major venues make the hotel an obvious choice for exhibitors and business travelers.accorhotels.com

name: Tokyo East Side Hotel Kaie
description: TOKYO EAST SIDE HOTEL KAIE features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Tokyo. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Hydrogen Information Centre - Tokyo Suisomir. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Popular points of interest near TOKYO EAST SIDE HOTEL KAIE include Tatsuminomori Kaihin Park, Tatsumi no Mori Green Park and Apostolic Memorial Monument. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Via Inn Higashiginza
description: Well situated in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Via Inn Higashiginza is set 300 metres from Nihon Tenji Seitei no Chi, 200 metres from Ensho-ji Temple and 700 metres from Birthplace of Keio University. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 200 metres from Hojuji Temple. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Trusler Memorial, American Legion Memorial Stones and Hoju Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 15 km from Via Inn Higashiginza.

name: Henn na Hotel Tokyo Nishikasai
description: Henn na Hotel Tokyo Nishikasai provides comfortable 3-star accommodation in Tokyo. It also offers free Wi-Fi. The rooms at the hotel are air-conditioned and offer slippers, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. They are also fitted with a hair dryer and a shower. Henn na Hotel Tokyo Nishikasai is a brief walk from Nishi-Kasai Train Station, allowing convenient access in and around Tokyo. Tokyo Skytree Tower and Ueno Park are just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Smile Hotel Tokyo Nihonbashi
description: Just 100 metres from Kayabacho Subway Station, Smile Hotel Nihonbashi offers rooms with free wired internet, a tea maker and a private bathroom. There is an on-site restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Smile Hotel Tokyo Nihonbashi come with an electric kettle with green tea. Slippers and a bathtub are provided. Tokyo Train Station is a 5-minute drive, and Tsukiji Fish Market is a 10-minute taxi ride. Nearby Kayabacho Station has direct subway links to Roppongi, Akihabara and Otemachi. Takashimaya Department Store is a 10-minute walk. Guests can unwind with a massage, and a coin launderette is on site. Laptops can be rented at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Hotel Niwa Tokyo
description: Located just a 4-minute walk from JR Suidobashi Station, Hotel Niwa offers an elegant accommodation with touches of Japanese traditional design. A Japanese-style courtyard and 2 on-site restaurants are featured. Free WiFi is available. Jimbocho Subway Station is a 5-minute stroll away. This hotel was selected as one of Top 25 Hotels in Japan by TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award 2018. Bright light filters through paper sliding screens in the modern rooms at Hotel Niwa Tokyo. Rooms are furnished with an LCD TV and fridge. A complimentary bottle of water is provided every day during your stay. Some rooms come with an extra long bed or a coffee machine. Hotel Niwa Tokyo features a Relaxation Lounge with massage chairs, overlooking a rooftop mini garden. Guests can work out at free fitness centre on site. A coin-operated launderette, drinks vending machines and a 24-hour business centre are available. Seasonal Japanese kaiseki multi-course meals can be savoured at Yukuri, with views of the garden. Dining Lieu offers casual French delicacies, specialising in farm to table vegetables. Hotel Niwa Tokyo is 10 minute on foot to Tokyo Dome Stadium. Tokyo Imperial Palace is a 20-minute walk away, as is Yasukuni Shrine.

name: Hotel Mystays Hamamatsucho
description: Hotel MyStays Hamamatsucho is located just a 3-minute walk from Daimon Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from JR Hamamatsucho Train Station. It offers a massage service, memory foam pillows and free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. Hamamatsucho Hotel MyStays is 500 metres from Hamamatsucho Monorail Station, which offers direct access to Haneda Airport in 18 minutes. Tokyo station is a mere 5-minute train ride away from JR Hamamatsucho Train Station by using the Keihin Tohoku line, while the Roppongi area is only a 5-minute train ride away from Daimon Subway Station on the Oedo Subway Line. This subway line also offers direct access to cultural centre Asakusa, the Tokyo Skytree and lively Shinjuku area. Tsukiji fish market is a 5-minute drive away. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities, while air purifier is available in rooms. Stylishly decorated, each room is equipped with a fridge, a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels and a tea set with green tea. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub and a toilet. Free toiletries, slippers and hairdryers are provided.

name: Comfort Hotel Tokyo Kanda
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the Comfort Hotel Tokyo Kanda. Nearby attractions include the Imperial Palace, The National Museum of Modern Art, Akihabara Electric Town, Meiji University and Tokyo Dome City amusement park and entertainment facility. Amenities include free continental breakfast and free coffee in the lobby. With the business traveler in mind, our Chiyoda-ku, Japan hotel provides free high-speed Internet access, large work desks in all rooms and access to copy and fax services. In-room amenities include refrigerators, hair dryers and cable TV with pay-per-view movies. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake is situated in Tokyo, 2.1 km from Odaiba Beach and 1.5 km from Tokyo Water Science Museum. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features an ATM, a business centre and currency exchange for guests. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Gas Science Museum, Ariake West Terminal Park and Panasonic Center Tokyo. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 11 km from Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake.

name: The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho, a Luxury Collection Hotel
description: A five-star travel experience with an unrivaled view awaits at The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho, a Luxury Collection Hotel. Let us welcome you to Japan's capital city with a seamless blend of historic elegance, modern style and exquisite service. Our hotel is superbly located in Tokyo's bustling downtown district, just steps from the iconic Akasaka Prince Classic House, directly connected to the subway station and a short distance from the city's main train station. The moment you step into our soaring Sky Lobby, with its abundant natural light, you'll know you've arrived somewhere special. Immaculately designed hotel rooms and suites feature unparalleled views of downtown Tokyo and modern technology such as free Wi-Fi, DVD players and tablet controls; Luxury Collection amenities in the bathroom elevate your stay. Our spa, indoor pool and heated public bath offer a restorative retreat, while our restaurants and bars serve a range of unique and flavorful options.Marriott

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai
description: Attractively set in the Kita district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai is situated 200 metres from Daiman-ji Temple, 300 metres from Hodo-in Temple and 300 metres from Baio-ji Temple. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Inatsuke Castle Ruins is less than 1 km away and Akabane Park is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai include Shoko-ji Temple, Yakumo Shrine and Catholic Akabane Church. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 33 km from the hotel.

name: Ueno First City Hotel
description: Ueno First City Hotel is located a 1-minute walk from Yushima Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from JR Okachimachi Station. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, 2 restaurants and massage services. Rooms at Ueno First City Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV, refrigerator and private bathroom with hairdryer. Business facilities and luggage storage are available. Guests can rent bicycles and use personal computers for a fee. Breakfast is served at Fushimi-Tei and Cafe Terrace Ruru. Located within a 10-minute walk from Ueno First City Hotel are tourist attractions such as the Ueno Zoo, Tokyo National Museum and The National Museum of Western Art. Kappabashi street is a 5-minute drive away. Akihabara, Asakusa and Ginza areas can be accessed directly via Ueno Station's 2 subway lines.

name: Tokyu Stay Ginza
description: Tokyu Stay Ginza offers modern spacious guestrooms and free property-wide WiFi, and is conveniently located a 3-minute walk from Ginza Train Station's Exit A7. JR Tokyo Station and Tokyo International Forum are a 15-minute walk away while the Imperial Palace can be reached with a 14-minute drive from the property. All units are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV with CNN channel, microwave and an electric kettle. Free amenities provided in the en suite bathroom include toothbrushes, shampoo and soap. Some units also have a kitchenette, equipped with a refrigerator. Free luggage storage is offered at the 24-hour front desk and trouser presses can be rented with no additional charge. The breakfast buffet served at the stylish on-site restaurant consists of a wide variety of Japanese and Western dishes. Kabukiza is just a 1-minute walk away from Ginza Tokyu Stay. Guests can also make a 3-minute walk to department stores like Mitsukoshi and Matsuya Ginza, or a 22-minute train ride to the lively Shinjuku area. Haneda Airport can be reached with a 24-minute ride on the Keikyu Line.

name: Sanco Inn Grande Tokyo Hamamatsucho
description: Open from August 2014, Sanco Inn Grande Tokyo Hamamatsucho is conveniently located a 3-minute walk from JR Hamamatsu Station and Daimon Subway Station. The property offers free WiFi in all areas, an internet PC and a printer. Guests here have easy access to the popular shopping and entertainment district Ginza, located a 12-minute drive away from the property. JR Shinagawa Station and JR Tokyo Station can be reached within a 6-minute train ride. Guests also have direct access to Haneda Airport via a 22-minute ride on the Tokyo Monorail. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an electric kettle and a fridge. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer is provided in the en suite bathroom. Services offered by the 24-hour front desk include free luggage storage and fax/photocopying services. There is a drinks vending machine and a coin-operated washing machine as well. Guests can start their day with a buffet-style breakfast offered at the on-site restaurant.

name: Tabist Hotel Mercury Asakusabashi
description: Located in Akihabara, Hotel Mercury Asakusabashi is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tokyo. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, restaurant, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Hotel Mercury Asakusabashi.Agoda

name: &Here Tokyo Ueno
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, &Here Tokyo Ueno is located in Tokyo, 300 metres from Shitamachi Museum and 400 metres from Matsuzakaya Ueno. Featuring a spa and wellness centre, this 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is 5.1 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Ryuseido Shinjo-in Temple. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At &Here Tokyo Ueno every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyu-Iwasaki-tei Garden, Yokoyama Taikan Memorial Hall and Saigo Takamori Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from &Here Tokyo Ueno.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-Guchi Tennozu Isle
description: Ideally located in the Shinagawa Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle is set 100 metres from Archi-Depot Museum, 300 metres from Tennozu Park and 700 metres from Higashishinagawa Kaijo Park. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and free shuttle service for guests. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle provides some units with river views, and each room is equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ebara Jinja Shrine, Yoganji Temple and Kujirazuka. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 8 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle.

name: Apa Hotel Roppongi Six
description: A stay at APA HOTEL Roppongi Six places you in the heart of Tokyo, within a 10-minute drive of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Imperial Palace. Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Higashi Shinjuku
description: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Higashi Shinjuku is located in central Tokyo, just across the street from Higashi Shinjuku Subway Station. It offers free internet access, 2 restaurants and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the famous Isetan Department Store. The adjacent subway station provides direct access to Roppongi, Yoyogi and Tsukiji Market. The rooms at Sotetsu Fresa Inn Higashi Shinjuku feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Amenities include a fridge and trouser press. Business facilities such as fax and photocopying are available at Sotetsu Fresa Inn Higashi Shinjuku. The hotel also provides laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage services. Western and Japanese breakfast foods are served at Royal Host Restaurant. Popular Chinese dishes such as Peking Duck are available at Bamiyan Chinese Restaurant.

name: Hotel Tavinos Hamamatsucho
description: Set in Tokyo, 2 km from Tokyo Tower, HOTEL TAVINOS HAMAMATSUCHO offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.1 km from Roppongi Hills. The units in the hotel are equipped with a TV and a hair dryer. Room cleaning services is available daily with additional charges. Tokyo City View Observation Deck is 4.2 km from HOTEL TAVINOS HAMAMATSUCHO, while Mori Art Museum is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Ici Hotel Tokyo Hatchobori
description: Attractively located in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, ICI HOTEL Tokyo Hatchobori is set 200 metres from Yasube Taketsune Horibe Monument, 500 metres from Oiwa Inari Shrine and 600 metres from Edo Bay Opening Port Monument. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Sakuragawa Monument. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ICI HOTEL Tokyo Hatchobori rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Reiganjima Island Water Level Observatory, War Disaster Memorial Service Monument and Messenger Statue - Chuo-Ohashi Bridge. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 16 km from ICI HOTEL Tokyo Hatchobori.

name: Hotel Mystays Higashi Ikebukuro
description: Offering rooms with free WiFi and a kitchenette, Hotel MyStays Higashi-Ikebukuro is just a minute's walk from Mukohara Station and a 7 minute walk from JR Otsuka Train Station on the Yamanote Line. Guests at MyStays Higashi-Ikebukuro stay in modern air-conditioned rooms with a bathtub-equipped bathroom with a hairdryer, toothbrushes and free toiletries. Each room has a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand movies and an air purifier. The kitchenette includes a stovetop, microwave, sink and fridge. Guests can sleep using a memory foam pillow. The hotel provides coin-operated internet stations and laundry machines. Shinjuku and Shibuya are a 20-minute train ride away. Sunshine Building is a 5-minute walk away. Shin-Otsuka Subway Station is a 10-minute walk, and offers direct access to Tokyo Dome.

name: Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel
description: Holding the proud distinction of being a Tokyo Disney Resort® Official Hotel, Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel offers unbeatable access via monorail to both Tokyo Disneyland® and Tokyo DisneySea®. We're also 10 minutes from Ikspiari, home to sensational shopping, dining and entertainment. Plan your visit to enjoy resort amenities like a free shuttle to and from the monorail, a full fitness center, Japanese-style baths and four exceptional restaurants. Our 1,016 contemporary, spacious hotel rooms and suites boast views of Tokyo Disney Resort® or the bay. The brand-new Park Wing is inspired by a luxury liner & features stylish Dog Lover Suites. Guests seeking a distinctive venue for a business meeting, wedding or social event in the Tokyo Disneyland® area can make use of 40,000 square feet of sophisticated venue space. Create lasting memories at Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Mystays Nippori
description: Hotel MyStays Nippori is a 5-minute walk from JR Nippori Train Station and a 15-minute ride from the Ameyoko Arcade. It offers modern guestrooms with a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. Guestrooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is fitted with a microwave and a fridge. The en suite bathroom features a bathtub and shower. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer are provided. Ironing equipment and kitchenware can be borrowed from the front desk. The hotel provides coin-operated laundry machines. Fax and photocopying services are offered. The shared lounge provides cup noodles and drink vending machines. Portable WiFi routers can be borrowed from the front desk, at an additional charge. MyStays Nippori is a 15-minute walk from Ueno Park and a 45-minute ride from Tokyo Disneyland. The nearby Nippori Station offers direct access to Narita Airport in 36-minutes via the Keisei Skyliner. Haneda International Airport is 35-minutes away via train.

name: Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho
description: In a prime location in the Koto Ward district of Tokyo, Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho is situated 400 metres from Fukagawa Park, 400 metres from Botancho Park and 500 metres from Ozeki Stone Tomioka Hachiman Monument. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is set 300 metres from Furuishibagawa Shinsui Park. The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a kettle, a hot tub, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with a city view. Guests at Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzenn can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tomioka Hachimangu Temple, Old Nitta Bridge and Ino Tadataka House Ruins. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 25 km from Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho.

name: Toyoko Inn Asakusa Kuramae No.2
description: Attractively located in the Taito district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No.2 is situated 200 metres from Kuramae Jinja Shrine, 400 metres from Kuramae Mizu no Yakata and 700 metres from World Bags and Luggage Museum. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms include a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. At the hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No.2. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tokyo Origami Museum, Japanese Sword Museum and Choju-in Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Asakusa Kuramae No.2.

name: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo - Bay Ariake
description: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake offers comfortable individually decorated rooms with free WiFi and spectacular night views of the bay area. It houses a convenience store, a restaurant and a cafe. Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake is just a 3-minute walk from Kokusai Tenjjijo Station, and a 5-minute walk from exhibition centre Tokyo Big Sight. Panasonic Centre Tokyo is 700 metres away. Rooms are air-conditioned and furnished with a flat-screen TV and extra long beds. A fridge and an electric kettle are provided, and the spacious bathroom offers a selection of toiletries. Some rooms have an air purifier/humidifier and a foot massage machine. Guests can find daily necessities in the convenience store, and enjoy massage service in their room. Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake offers shuttle services to and from Tokyo Disneyland/Sea for free. Restaurant Sosai Patio boasts contemporary local cuisine and international dishes with a touch of local flavour.

name: Hotel Gracery Tamachi
description: Gracery Tamachi Hotel Tokyo is set in Tokyo and is close to nearby attractions, such as Oki Electric Industry. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with plasma TVs and complimentary wireless internet. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and includes slippers, a private bathroom and a refrigerator. They all offer heating, a telephone and a desk. Hotel Gracery Tamachi houses Bonsalute Cafe, which serves lunch and dinner and presents guests with everything they require for an enjoyable night within the hotel. Located in Central Tokyo, Tamachi Gracery Hotel is just moments from well-known clubs and pubs. Guests can also visit Keio University and NEC Supertower.Revato

name: City Pension Zem
description: Located in Tokyo and with Masago Monument reachable within 400 metres, City Pension Zem provides a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Genyadana Monument, Hamacho Park, and Basho Inari Shrine. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. All units at City Pension Zem include air conditioning and a desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Revival Monument of Japanese Traditional Chinese Medicine, Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street and Site of Mutsu Munemitsu Residence. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from City Pension Zem.

name: Exsaison Sugamo
description: No description found

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyobashi
description: Situated in the heart of Tokyo, only a 5-minute walk from JR Tokyo Station, Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyobashi offers comfortable rooms with free WiFi and a restaurant. Tokyo Skytree is a 25-minute train ride away. The air-conditioned rooms at Kyobashi Mitsui Garden feature modern décor and are fitted with a flat-screen TV. A hairdryer and slippers are provided in the en suite bathroom. Services offered at this hotel include free luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk and daily maid service. The popular shopping district Ginza and the Tokyo International Forum are both a 12-minute walk away. Tokyo Disney Resort can be reached with a 30-minute train ride on the Keiyo Line.

name: La'gent Hotel Shinjuku Kabukicho
description: Ideally situated in Tokyo, La'gent Hotel Shinjuku Kabukicho features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Okubo Park. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. La'gent Hotel Shinjuku Kabukicho offers an American or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Korea Museum, Choko-ji Temple and Samurai Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from La'gent Hotel Shinjuku Kabukicho.

name: Centurion Hotel Ikebukuro Station
description: Opened in September 2014, this hotel is conveniently located within a 3-minute walk from JR Ikebukuro Station. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. It is situated right in the heart of lively Ikebukuro area. Each air-conditioned room at Centurion Hotel Ikebukuro comes with a flat-screen TV, Slumberland mattress, an air purifier. fridge and a telephone. The en suite bathroom features a bath tub, hairdryer and free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner and body wash. The Centurion Hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage services and shops on site. Massages can be requested at an additional charge. There is a coin launderette at the property. The 2nd floor restaurant serves American and Asian food for breakfast. There is a convenience store located on the ground floor. The hotel is a 5-minute walk to the Sunshine 60 Observatory. The Ikebukuro Station offers direct train access to Shinjuku, Harajuku and Shibuya, all within a 20-minute ride.

name: Henn Na Hotel Tokyo Hamamatsucho
description: Situated in Central Tokyo, Henn na Hotel Tokyo Hamamatsucho is just two minutes from World Trade Center. Guests can also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi during their stay. Guests of the hotel are encouraged to treat themselves with a range of relaxing spa treatments, including facials and massages. Additional services include 24-hour security. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a hair dryer, a refrigerator and a shower. They each have slippers and an in-room safe. Tokyo's popular tourist spots are within close proximity to Henn na Hotel Tokyo Hamamatsucho, with Kyu Shiba Rikyu Garden only minutes away. Shiba Park, Shiodome Media Tower and Shiodome are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Monterey La Soeur Ginza
description: Just a 1-minute walk from Ginza-Itchome Subway Station, the European-style Monterey Lasoeur Ginza offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, an LCD TV and a private bath. Ristorante San Michele serves Italian cuisine. Rooms at Hotel Monterey Lasoeur Ginza have a classical charm, with striped drapes and pastel walls. All are air-conditioned, with a fridge and nightwear provided. Situated in the Ginza area, the hotel is about a 4-minute walk from Ginza Subway Station and Yurakucho Train Station on the Yamanote Line. The Imperial Palace is 1 km away, and Tsukiji Fish Market is 1.5 km away. The hotel’s restaurant is open for all meals.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi
description: Conveniently located in the Kita district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi is set 100 metres from Catholic Akabane Church, 400 metres from Akabane Park and 600 metres from Daiman-ji Temple. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is close to popular attractions like Josho-ji Temple, Yakumo Shrine and Hodo-in Temple. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All guest rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. An Asian breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Shoko-ji Temple, Inatsuke Castle Ruins and Baio-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 33 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi.

name: Keio Presso Inn Otemachi
description: Conveniently located in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Keio Presso Inn Otemachi is set 70 metres from Tokiwa Park, 600 metres from COREDO Muromachi 1 and 500 metres from Mitsukoshi Nihonbashi Main Store. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 3.6 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Yanagi Inari Shrine. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Yuito Nihonbashi, Fukutoku Shrine and Daiichi Sankyo Kusuri Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from Keio Presso Inn Otemachi.

name: Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji
description: A 3-minute walk from Yutenji Station, Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji lies in a quiet area. Some room feature a kitchenette and a washing machine. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi at the entire property. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a private washing machine and a safety deposit box. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a fridge and an electric kettle. Kitchenware is also provided and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. Nightwear and slippers are offered for all guests. The Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji has a 24-hour front desk, which offers free luggage storage. The hotel provides dry cleaning, photocopying and courier services at extra charges. Drink vending machines are available. From Yutenji Station it takes 11 minutes by train to Roppongi area and Shinjuku is a 20-minute train ride away.

name: Akabane Holic Hotel
description: Situated in Tokyo and with Akabane Park reachable within 200 metres, Akabane Holic Hotel features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Rooms come with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at Akabane Holic Hotel have a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Akabane Holic Hotel offers an American or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Inatsuke Castle Ruins, Josho-ji Temple and Catholic Akabane Church. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 33 km from Akabane Holic Hotel.

name: Hotel Graphy Nezu
description: This affordable hotel is located in Taito, just a few minutes from Ueno Zoo. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and a coffee bar. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of Hotel Graphy Nezu, including a library, a shared kitchen and luggage storage. Laundry facilities are also available. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature premium amenities such as a rain shower, an oversized bathtub and slippers. They are all soundproofed and include a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. Nezu Graphy Hotel offers a conveniently located café where guests can have a bite to eat before discovering the property's surrounds. Hotel Graphy Nezu is close to Ueno Zoo Monorail, making it easy for guests to explore Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Ueno Park is within a 10-minute walk and Haneda Airport is 35 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: The Onefive Tokyo Shibuya
description: The OneFive Tokyo Shibuya features rooms with free WiFi in Tokyo, conveniently set an 8-minute walk from Shibuya Center Town. The OneFive Tokyo Shibuya features furniture from ACME Furniture. Meiji Jingu Shrine is a 10-minute walk away. All rooms at The OneFive Tokyo Shibuya are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a refrigerator. Some rooms also boast a balcony. Guests can borrow a trouser press, ironing facilities and air humidifier. Speaking English, Japanese and Vietnamese, staff are ready to help around the clock. The nearest Station is Shibuya Station, located a 10-minute walk away. Meiji Jingu Stadium is 1.9 km from the accommodation. Tokyo Haneda Airport is 14 km away.

name: Hundred Stay Tokyo Shinjuku
description: Hundred Stay Shinjuku provides modern service apartments with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Featuring a fitness room and cafe, it is a 3-minute walk to JR Okubo Train Station. One- and two-bedroom apartments at Hundred Stay Tokyo Shinjuku come with a fully equipped kitchen, living room and washing machine. All rooms include a microwave, fridge and en suite bathroom. Guests can watch a DVD or relax in the bathtub. From nearby Okubo Station, Shinjuku Station is 1 train stop away, and Tokyo Station is a 25-minute ride. Shin-Okubo Korea Town is 500 metres away. The lively Kabukicho area is a 15-minute walk. The hotel features free internet access. Laundry services are available and a concierge is on call 24/7.

name: The Aoyama Grand Hotel
description: With a stay at The Aoyama Grand Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Tokyo, within a 5-minute drive of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Imperial Palace. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: New Otani Inn Tokyo
description: Right next to JR Osaki Train Station, New Otani Inn Tokyo offers stylish rooms and an en suite bathroom with bathtub. The hotel features massage services and a Japanese restaurant. Rooms at Tokyo New Otani Inn are decorated with modern art and red pillows. You can try on the linen yukata robe and watch TV, or have a soak in the bath. Directly connected to the Yamanote Line’s Osaki Station, the hotel is 1 train stop from JR Shinagawa Shinkansen Station. The Shinjuku, Marunouchi and Odaiba areas are all within a 20-minute train ride. Guests can enjoy browsing the hotel’s shops, or rent a laptop from the 24-hour front desk to surf the Web. Traditional multi-course Kaiseki meals featuring seasonal ingredients are on offer at Funachaya Restaurant. The Lounge serves tea during the day and cocktails in the evening, while Bar Outrigger pours drinks at its polished counter.

name: Dormy Inn Akihabara Hot Spring
description: Renovated in July 2015, Dormy Inn offers rooms with free internet, good transportation links and an open-air bath with sauna. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Akihabara Electric Town. Dormy Inn's air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, hairdryer and private shower room. Dormy Inn Akihabara's facilities include a restaurant, free internet access in the lobby and coin-operated laundry machines with free detergent. Tumble dryers are available at a fee. There are separate open-air baths for men and women available at the property. Breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant. Free Yonaki Soba ramen noodles are catered at night. It is less that a 5-minute walk from JR Akihabara Station and Suehirocho Station for the Tokyo Metro Ginza Line.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Daimon
description: Ideally located in Tokyo, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Daimon offers an American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Shinbashi Shiogama Shrine. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Sotetsu Fresa Inn Daimon include Hibiya Shrine, Seishoji Temple and Sakurada Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Best Western Hotel Fino Tokyo Akasaka
description: Our restaurant is temporarily closed and breakfast suspended until further notice. The Best Western Hotel Fino Tokyo Akasaka brings modern midscale accommodations to the heart of Japan's pulsating capital city. Perfectly position in Akasaka, the upmarket residential and commercial district in Minato, this smart and stylish hotel is surrounded by many of Tokyo's most enchanting parks and gardens, major corporations and embassies. The 87 contemporary rooms all come fully equipped with modern amenities, guests can unwind on comfortable beds, stay refreshes with modern bathrooms and power showers, or keep connected with working areas and complimentary Wi-Fi. Every stay will be supported by Best Western's world famous service standards. Akasaka Station is connected to the Tokyo Metro's Chiyoda Line, putting the entire city and its attractions within easy reach. Whether you're visiting Tokyo for business or pleasure, the Best Western Hotel Fino Tokyo Akasaka is the perfect choice.bestwestern.com

name: Ginza Creston
description: Only a 7-minute walk from Tsukiji Subway Station, Ginza Creston offers guestrooms with Sumida River or city views and hotel-wide free WiFi. All rooms are located between the 33rd and 38th floor. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute taxi ride away. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Guests can use the electric kettle to make warm green tea and wear the provided nightwear, and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Ginza Creston is a 5-minute walk from Tsukiji Outer Market and a 20-minute walk from Ginza shopping areas. Haneda Airport is a 50-minute train ride and Narita International Airport is a 75-minute train ride away. Guests can request relaxing massages for an extra cost. Luggage storage and laundry services are available. Japanese dishes are served at Shabuzen, and grilled Teppanyaki meals at Kazan restaurant. Light meals and refreshments are available Lounge Prashanti.

name: Comfort Hotel Tokyo Higashi Nihombashi
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the Comfort Hotel Tokyo Higashi Nihombashi in Tokyo, Japan near the Ryogoku Kokugikan. Nearby areas of interest also include the Haneda Airport, the Akihabara neighborhood and Tokyo's Imperial. Prepare for a successful day ahead with amenities like free continental breakfast, free high-speed Internet access, free coffee and copy and fax services. All spacious guest rooms and suites have refrigerators, LCD TVs, hair dryers, and warm-water shower toilets. Behind every great day is a great night at our Comfort Hotel Tokyo Higashi Nihombashi. Book now. Phone Charge: 10 YEN per 3 minutes. Children 12 and under stay free with parent/grandparent when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Nohga Hotel Ueno Tokyo
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from The Shitaya Shrine, NOHGA HOTEL UENO TOKYO features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Choen-ji Temple, and within 5.7 km of the city centre. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Popular points of interest near NOHGA HOTEL UENO TOKYO include Ryukoku-ji Temple, Shitamachi Museum and Saigo Takamori Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.
